concat_comments: Convenient location with Divvy bikes right across the street and Blue Line close by  The room got really warm hot and I wasnt sure how to adjust the heating no coffee maker
The place was great and in a good location near a bunch of bars and restaurants  Great for a weekend in the city

I expected this visit to be very pleasant and I was in no way let down  Our stay was secure and comfortable as well as very stylish  Every aspect of this trip was very well thought out and they quickly responded to any questions I had  I highly recommend staying with Zencity  Thank you for the quick responses and incredible hospitality  We will look into using Zencity properties again in the future for visits
Great bang for buck  bring some ear plugs though  thin walls  Thanks for letting us stay  Lock box code was incorrect
Has great views of the South Side and Lake Michigan  Pretty sparsely furnished  in a decent part of town
Wonderful place and exactly as described  Fantastic location  clean  and amazing view  Everyone in the building was incredibly friendly   I will absolutely recommend this place to others
Great place and very convenient for the areas I needed to find  Very neat and clean   Really love the place   Would love to book again

Great space and location  Be aware train is outside the window so if you are a light sleeper it could be problematic  Solid place and easy to check in  The train noise is very loud and should be noted  Train noise is loud and should be noted  Dust bunnies the bathroom

Excellent location and beautiful historic building  but the unit was not clean to level expected of a typical motel  let alone COVID    clean expectations  Also  repairs needed were never addressed  wall mounted bedside table had been dislodged  and tilted downward  so items slid off  You couldnt put a glass of water on it   The management company is not particularly responsive  They reply quickly  but dont actually address the issue   just ask for more info  I sent photos  on their request  and after many days still did not receive a response addressing the clean concerns  Pretty accurate  but not in good repair  E g  wall mounted bedside table had been pulled out of the wall   was hanging at tilt  needs repair  Kitchen with minimal supplies  e g  a french press coffee maker only  which is fine  but the hot water kettle provided had no cord  so not usable  Needed to boil water in a small pot  Floors not clean  hairs in the bathroom  handles on drawers   cabinets with crumbs and stains had clearly not been wiped down  carpet with stains including gum  drawer in bath unclean The unit is managed by a company  A different person responded each time  Responses only addressed on of multiple points raised in my message  and essentially kicked it down the road  requiring multiple correspondences and ultimately not addressing the concerns raised  Good price  but frustrating to pay a clean fee for an apt  that was not clean to basic motel standards  let alone COVID    standards

Was a really cool place the only downside was it smelled like weed and when we went to the intercom it wouldnt work so we had to wait for someone to open the door for us other than that the place was nice Was a really cool place the only downside was it smelled like weed and when we went to the intercom it wouldnt work so we had to wait for someone to open the door for us other than that the place was nice

Stayed here for a comedy show  I think it was a little overpriced  but I think this thought was fueled by seeing a different rate a few weeks later  It was about half of the price that I had booked it for    Apart from that  it was a cool place to show up and sleep  Parking is about a block away  and for the most part  was exactly as described  If you are going to a show at Stifel Theater  it s across the street  The host provides good instructions on how to get into the building  The door to the apartment doesn t lock properly  but a smart lock was added to help with this issue    Overall  it was a good experience

The stay was overall great  I loved this apartment and how close it was to stores and restaurants  The only complaint I have is the comforter did smell like bed head  like it might not have been washed from the last guests  I did  bring laundry soap and re wash everything as well as re wipe down the bathroom  Laundry does cost  the garage near the apartment was so so so well priced  Overall it was a good weekend

This apartment was adequate  a  you get what you pay for  experience  It was a low budget option within   minute walking distance to the blue line  I felt safe in the neighborhood and the apartment  The apartment was old  chipping paint corroded fixtures on tub  but overall seemed clean  The bathtub is advertised but there was no stopper for the drain  so no ability to take a bath  when I reported this no effort was made to rectify   Therefore taking a shower was awkward in the cramped space of the high walled bathtub  The wifi network info was incorrect so I was without access to secured wifi for one day of my stay  delayed response from host company  Again  not major issues but not   star service  Please see messages I sent during stay for improvements  thanks  Wifi login details were not accurate Slow to respond regarding wifi login

Couldnt get into the building for up to     minutes because they didnt think to send me it ahead of time and their costumer service didnt seem to know the code either  This was after a long drive pushing  am and a struggle to get a later check out with this company which ended with us purchasing an extra day  The purchase was fine  money talks  but you would think a business that seemingly had a tight schedule would be in order  Well just getting into the building was the beginning of my woes  Come to my room and open the door    its a mess  Dirty and lived in is the vibe this air bnb must live by as a company motto  Mind you  our check in is scheduled to be no earlier than around   ish the previous day  So they didnt even try to clean it with the extra   hrs we were driving to St Louis they had  The most they could offer me was to sleep in the filth and theyll have it clean the following day  They showed their benevolence by granting us an extra hour to stay in their bnb before leaving  At this point Im fuming and ask for a refund  didnt even stay  we just went to a best Western two towns over  Refund hasnt been pushed yet and its been   days since exposed to this joke  management must feed off the bad reviews Im sure youre aware of the quality I was exposed to  Including how long its taking you to issue a refund and its just an overall bitter experience

When we arrived to check in the door was propped open and the lock for the door has been installed backwards  with the keypad on the inside and deadbolt on the outside   I immediately contacted Zencity and they said they would escalate to their manager and report back  They did not report back and I had to call back to check on someone coming to fix it  They said no one could come that day  Our options were to relocate to another Airbnb for one night and then move back after the lock was fixed  It was not possible for us to move and then move back based on the plans we had made for our visit so we had to prop a table against the door that night since there was no lock   Zencity did not come correct the lock until the next day at  pm after I had to follow up with a call and messages  After that we had two service men visit to remove air conditioning units without warning or our permission   The health and safety concerns and lack of responsiveness from Zencity was unacceptable    The Airbnb was only partially clean  The only positive note I can share is on the location  The location was great   walkable to the arch and Cardinals game   We will never stay at an Airbnb hosted by Zencity again

Overall a very nice place  The neighborhood was the biggest bonus for us  We ate at   restaurants in the area and visited park Ave coffee both mornings  The beds were clean and comfortable  The view out of the windows was beautiful  there s a community garden directly across the street  Thanks for a nice stay Hello  Thank you for a nice stay  Just a few small things  we attempted to use the small vacuum to clean up some cereal  it didn t really work which made us wonder how well the place gets vacuumed  I wiped the remainder of the cereal off the kitchen floor with a wet paper towel and it was very dirty  It looked like the floors hadn t been mopped in a while  We noticed the air filters on the hvac unit needed to be changed pretty bad and noticed it was fairly dusty in the apartment in general  Which was telling of the filters  We have bad allergies so we notice things like this  Overall we would stay again  We absolutely loved Lafayette area  We walked to park Ave coffee both mornings  ate at squires and the brewery

As advertised  Historic building with attendant pros and cons  Beautiful location  Needs a new sink faucet badly  Paint peeling in the tube Second guest was not added to the buildings list  I had to connect zencity directly for them to gain access

I stayed in Zencity s apartment with my husband and two teenage kids  It was great for everyone to have their own space and common rooms to hang out together  We appreciated the comfortable beds and full  stocked kitchen  The location was perfect  close to the train and lots of places to walk to  We used spot hero for parking and found a place nearby to keep our car  Would absolutely stay there again
Great location and house is amazing  Thanks so much for having me in your home  Only bad thing  the hair dryer didn t work  Other than that  everything was amazing

The communication with ZenCity staff was terrible  The unit I rented in St  Louis at The Bordeaux had a malfunctioning central air unit  This is a top floor unit with no shade  the temperature was in the upper   s on the first day    two windows could not be left open because their screens were missing    From the moment I checked in  the thermostat read    degress  when I turned it down to    degress  it said it would take    hours to achieve that temperature  After waiting    hours with no change to the temperature  I started looking for the HVAC unit   found it in a closet  The fan was blowing air in the apartment  but it was not cooling the air  I noticed that the unit had no filter   then I noticed that the filter was sitting on the floor  between the unit   the wall of the closet   it was completely packed full of dirt  Id estimate that it had not been changed in more than a year  so the maintenance of the building may have been weak for quite a while   There were plastic wrappers   spare parts sitting on top of the water heater that appeared to have been used to repair the HVAC system    it appeared that someone may have abandoned a repair job mid way through the process   then the unit was rented before the repair was finished    In my case  it was late August  extremely hot in St  Louis   although I did sleep in the unit for one night  with no a c  with the windows open   sweated all night on the sheets  I was not willing to do it two nights in a row  I was left so frustrated by the complete lack of assistance  I didnt even want to be there   Three ZenCity staff responded  late  to my texts or calls  all asking about the nature of the problem  None ever followed up to ask me what I wanted done about it  or to tell me what was happening  One employee suggested that he could control the temperature remotely  asked me what temperature I would like it set at   then never followed up  The temperature never changed   neither did the thermostat  There was no obvious indication anywhere that the thermostat could be managed remotely  If so  that feature also did not work    The ZenCity staff communicated through text   email  outside of AirBnBs messaging app  despite AirBnBs guidance to only use the messaging app  so they would have a trail of evidence to troubleshoot any bad experiences  I sent multiple messages through the app  as well as directly to ZenCity employees  who ultimately never did anything to help me  After the fact  they never followed up to apologize   After receiving no assistance the following morning  I checked out early  with temperatures forecast in the mid   s  AirBnB quickly issued a refund for the second day   a partial refund for the first     Although ZenCitys reviews on the AirBnB site were ok  their reviews for the same property on other websites were generally worse  This was probably the worst vacation experience Ive had anywhere in the last    years   The paint in the unit was badly chipped   scraped by furniture  inconsistent with the photos  The check in process is complicated  The nature of the lock system is such that you could easily be locked out of the unit    reliant on ZenCity to help you regain access to your things   The HVAC was obviously not operational  The worst thing  though  was the customer service   lack of responsiveness when I had a serious problem  which made it impossible to stay   finish my trip  Ive never left a negative review before  but this was truly a  very bad experience  As I repeatedly said in my messages to ZenCity representatives  the temperature in this apartment was miserably hot     degrees     the a c unit was not working   had obviously not been maintained  But the problem was  after    hours  no one had sent maintenance staff to check out the problem  offered to accommodate us elsewhere  or anything else  I was repeatedly asked what was wrong   then I never received responses about what would be done   nothing ever changed

This is a beautiful apartment   Location is great and can easily walk to all things great to do in St  Louis  Truly enjoyed our stay  Such a beautiful apartment   Everything was cozy  clean  and as described

This place is nice and simple  Not too much  not too little  In a nice location  get parking early  and if your vegetarian  vegan they have great options around them  you should order your Uber eats before  pm   All in all a decent spot  Thank you for allowing us to stay in your unit  The toilet kept running and has dried drip stains when we came in

I would definitely book with zencity in the future  Besides a few clean issues  the experience was nice  you are right in heart of the city  Besides the few cleanliness mishaps  the place was nice  Although there was a sign with an updated time stamp for the date the place had been clean  there were a few rooms not thoroughly clean  The kitchen stove appeared as if someone had just finished cooking  I wiped a nice amount grease off of the stove  The table in the living area was stained with cup marks  I wiped it down and my napkin was dirty as well  These few things prompted me to re clean all the areas knew I would be touching  Just a suggestion the hanging soap rack on the shower head in the bathroom is rusted and should be replaced

I loved staying in this apartment  Clean  easy access to Forest Park  restaurants  and music venues in Central West End  Service was excellent  and I would recommend this location to anyone looking for a cute  cozy home in the middle of the city  I loved staying at this apartment in Central West End  Easy access to hospital  Forest Park and many of the restaurants in the area  Thank you for being so accommodating during my stay   I will definitely keep this location in mind if I come back to St  Louis in the future   Thank you for everything

Very disappointed in my stay with zen city  I ve stayed with zen city before   I also used to live in the building so I was anticipating a similar experience  However that was not the case at the start of our stay  You d think that using digital locks is a good idea  when it works  But when it doesn t work  it can be a catastrophe  The reliance on technology without a clear contingency is not a smart way of doing business    It was   am and we had arrived at the apartment only to find that the digital lock had malfunctioned  inhibiting us from using the code to enter  We called customer service and they attempted to help us get in using new codes and digital codes but to no avail  I appreciate all the help Oshane provided however this was unacceptable  We were informed that there was no other way into the apartment and that there were no keys to enter the apartment  We were told that we had to travel to a different building  Mind you it was   am  As we were leaving  we were stopped by the front desk who ultimately found a way for us to enter    The next morning we were unable to leave our apartment without a way to re enter due to the broken digital lock  The locks were eventually fixed hours later    The apartment was ok  There was construction every morning and from time to time the bathroom sink would gargle and backup with old water  smelled unpleasant   A few stains on the couch  Furthermore the internet that services the apartment was not equipped to handle working from home     I requested compensation from management but my calls have done unheard  This is most frustrating as our experience getting their affected our trip thereafter and we ve been ignored by management  I demand compensation  Very disappointed in my stay with zen city  I ve stayed Great location and the building staff members were super helpful

Great location  decently clean  although some repairs were needed to the bathroom tiles  A member of my group left a suit in the closet and they have not been very communicative as we ve tried to locate it  The tiles in one of the bathroom floors needs to be fixed  Main door to the apartment is very difficult to open

This unit checked off all the right boxes when booking  Laundry  Two bedrooms  Newly remodeled  Great location  Sparkling clean  Only one review    I do utilize reviews and knew I was taking my chances   After checking in realized we only had one bldg key amongst the three of us  Asked for extra but couldn t accommodate  Made it work  Beds were hands down the most uncomfortable any of us had ever tried sleeping on  Unit was sparkling clean but shower didn t drain  Be sure and note that coffee maker is a French press  We brought a small Mr Coffee along  Love the area  A few small tweaks and toppers for the mattresses and this place could be     Hello Enjoyed our stay but feel a few tweaks could make it an even better space   The shower does not drain well  This is something anyone who is clean would note right away    The bed was the most uncomfortable mattress   I know that can be subjective but my    year old son who accompanied us this trip said he didn t sleep well either due to mattress  I believe this was my   th airbnb stay and numerous VRBO hotels over the years  Don t skimp on the mattress bc if your guests don t get a good nights sleep they won t be back  An easy fix would be a feather topper   Huge difference between an agency managing properties vs homeowners  Coffee is provided     of the time along with a coffee maker and filters  I know a French press was provided but maybe consider some ground coffee  Also providing a pitcher that filters water would be a nice touch   A couple of chairs for the back door deck would be a nice addition with a small table when the weather gets nicer   Unit was sparkling clean  The shower drain needs to be addressed sooner rather than later  Thank you for hosting

Not responsive  passcode was not sent until I stand by the door and make a phone call and test code and change the code and test it again  It was    outside  I have to wait for them set the passcode instead of they set it up before I arrive   In the morning I make up my mind and prepared to go to school for my first class in new semester  the door of the building is broken  and it is broken for a long while  which they did not mention at all  My Uber cancelled my trip to school and charged me    dollars for waiting  The only way out seems to be the path through the dumpster and yes  it is    outside  I did not go to my first class due to it  Assuredly I asked help from host  not body replied to me  I have to walk all the way through that dumpster and detour to the door of the building and enter the passcode and the people inside of the building can get out   Nobody will help you when you were in trouble there  And room is old I can accept that as the price is relatively low  For cleanliness  you can tell the hair of others in the towel  etc  And people lives in upstairs is quite active   Location is ok  but I would recommend some else to live if you need food and water
Beautiful space  Hi the apartment was even better than expected  I unwittingly spent much more for the apartment than I had planned  but Clane was fantastic and talked to me about my concerns

An excellent choice for staying in St  Louis  The building is clean  the check in process was seem less  and with all the security provided  I rested with ease knowing my family and I  along with our belongings were safe and secure  The amenities were above and beyond what you would expect the rooftop deck was amazing   all in all  very pleased with our experience  Email and text notifications kept us updated throughout the entire process  An excellent choice for staying in St  Louis  The building is clean  the check in process was seem less  and with all the security provided  I rested with ease knowing my family and I  along with our belongings were safe and secure  The amenities were above and beyond what you would expect the rooftop deck was amazing   all in all  very pleased with our experience
great overall stay

Beautiful place and great location  As others have mentioned  though  there was an issue with things being not properly clean  Hopefully ZenCity will pay more attention to this in the future  Wrong door code It was clear that some areas had not been wiped down   swept thoroughly

This Airbnb was located in a very safe neighborhood  Parking was a bit difficult and do keep in mind that there are     flights of stairs you must go up to the apartment  no elevator   The apartment itself was very clean and comfortable  It is in an old apartment building like most of them in the area  Upon arrival the air was    degrees in the apartment  The first night was miserable but by our second night stay it had finally cooled down to    degrees  It never did reach the    degrees that we sat the thermostat at  There was a strong marijuana scent in the evenings coming from other apartments throughout the building  The smell was a bit overpowering and unpleasant  keep in mind also

Great place in a great location for a very reasonable price Loved the place  only thing is one of the bathroom sinks has a pretty bad clog
Cool place to stay
Great place to stay  Once I found free parking on the side street
Cute place  Great area to stay
It was a nice living experience  Very convenient check in system and very clean environment
Nice and cozey just wished bathtub was different   Felt very small   Other than that place was great

Everything was nice   Just like the pictures    The only negative things we found was the apartment smelled like smoke     really the whole building did   We found ashes on top of the fridge   Lastly  there was a book on the table in the living room and it had nude pictures in it   which I felt was disgusting if someone was staying there with children   Overall it was a decent place to stay   Beds were amazing and it was great pricing for the stay  Everything was real nice   The only negative that I found was that the building smelled like smoke especially inside the apartment that we had  We actually found ashes on top of the fridge   lastly  there was a book on the table in the living room that had nude pictures in it that I found inappropriate if children had been staying there   Other than that  everything els was nice

Very stylish apartment in a great location  In general  the place was very clean  but there was mold in the shower and quite a bit of long hairs in the bathroom   It would be nice to have a small amount of coffee and tea in the apartment
Great   extremely stylish
The apartment was nice and clean  Bedding was very comfortable  Great location  But the stove and dryer did not work  I told them and nothing was done about it

Great location in the historic district   Modern apt  with plenty of space   We found some great restaurants around the area   We left our car in the parking lot and walked to Union Station and the Gateway Arch   It was a good hike  but easy walking and allowed us to see more of the city  We were surprised not find any cooking supplies at all   Typically  there is salt  pepper  sugar  olive oil  etc   Most times there is also tea and coffee   The living room carpet should be thoroughly clean or replaced   It didnt appear to be vacuumed  but it may be the carpet or vacuum cleaner   Not your issue  but unfortunately when we left  someones dog had pooped on the first floor just out of the elevator and all the way out the door to the parking lot   Just thought you should know  in case you want to mention it to the property management company

I was disappointed with my stay here  The unit had a bad smell as soon as we checked in and I immediately alerted the host  however while their communication was good  it was not followed up by action  They offered ozone treatment etc  but did not actually do it even after I told them to go ahead to schedule it  All the window AC s were terribly dirty and had the red light on requiring clean  Walking on the floor bare feet left you with black soles  All this also I told the host but nothing was done about it  Cleanliness is a big thing with me and this unit failed completely in meeting my standards  The sofa was dirty with stains on it   and the whole place looked tired and shabby  This unit is not worth the price we paid

We were very dissatisfied with our unit  We had to call to get a code for the outer door  The apartment was unlocked  The trash cans had not been emptied  A water bottle and trash was on a windowsill  The trash cans had not been emptied  Dirty towels were left in the laundry hamper  There were no hand towels and wash clothes or towels for the kitchen  There was no coffee or filters  I called the hostess and she seemed rather uncaring  She offered a one bedroom unit for the three of us  That obviously would not work  She wanted pictures so I sent them  We clean the washer which smelled horrible because it stays closed all the time   The lint filter in the dryer was stuffed  We stayed up till midnight washing linens so we could sleep  The sheets on one bed were on sideways  The next day someone changed all the sheets and left clean linens for the bath and kitchen  They emptied the trash but did not sweep  Hair is in every corner  It was advertised as three bedroom and two baths  The shower in one bath did not work   I cannot believe this unit can be charged for  I will never rent from Zencity again
Close to downtown   Nice modern space  Felt safe  lots of security features
Great place

The place was really nice  in a good locality and close to lot of fun places   The apartment was really clean and as described  Had some trouble figuring out how to check in and with parking but figured it out after a while  Enjoyed staying here  The check in instructions are not clear enough  I saw one more person having a hard time finding the place and getting in and I helped them out   Reaching Zencity on the phone was hard and waited on the call for    minutes and ended it  Even on the app they took a long time to respond
Unit was amazing  had everything you would need  Bed was super comfortable    stars   Everything was amazing

Great place to stay  great location and easy check in  But when we got there we noticed there was no parking pass and we mentioned that but they still tried charging  Double check everything is in your room  Also the carpet in the room didn t seemed to be vacuumed so we had to do it ourselves  Also the bed sheets seem dirty and we changed those as well  Other than that it was a beautifully updated nice place to stay close to downtown  There wasn t a parking pass in our room and we mentioned that but you still tried charging  Remember to double check if it s in the room

Great location  Spacious rooms and comfy beds  Washer and dryer was helpful as well  Parking isn t the best but it ended up working out fine   we always ended up finding a street spot even on the weekend  Definitely get a smell of weed in certain parts of the condo at certain times of day  Communication is not the greatest but check in instructions were clear  Overall really enjoyed our stay  Hello  Very much enjoyed the stay  Great space and location  The bed was comfy and clean linens  We loved the large bedrooms and the washer and dryer  However  we never got a response from host on our question  the living room and kitchen smelled like weed at times and rugs and carpet were a little dirty  But other than that great place to stay

Make sure you reach out to the host for your door code to get into the unit  as it wasnt communicated clearly before we arrived   Furthermore  the on site parking was amazing  but as of our visit we had to pay the normal parking rate and reach out for reimbursement   The host company had great customer service  and the unit itself was outstanding   Outside of my minor inconveniences listed above  this place and this host are easily   Star material  I recommend providing the passcode for the door before the visit begins   Also  we did have to be reimbursed for parking  as our fob did not let us out of the garage   We left all of the used dishes in dishwasher  clean  of course  and every used towel in the hamper  in the master bedroom   Hopefully that makes clean a touch easier for you all   Thank you for letting us stay in such a nice home

This was a great location and easy access to downtown STL  Company provided great communication on accessing the apartment and directions  Thanks for letting us stay with you  This was our first time staying in St  Louis and we felt very safe with how private this location was with the gated fence and entry    Cons  one of the bar stools was broken when we got there and the towels were dirty and had pubic hairs on them
Everything was neat and clean and whole apartment looked amazing  Zencity was a perfect host  Zencity was a perfect host

Great location  clean  great price   However  the day before check in I asked if I could get in       min before the  pm check in time to set up for a work call and only got a  well check on it  response    The fob I got did not work when I got back late at night  luckily a resident was coming in and let me in or I would have been out of luck  Communication was ok  and I got a fob after mine quit working  but I never got an answer after the receptionist told me the fob wasnt working well for anyone

Accommodation clean  comfortable  well equipped  and in a nice location in STL   I wasnt happy with the customer service from Zencity  The accommodation was clean and comfortable and VERY well equipped   My ONLY reason for marking my evaluation as low as I did was that I was disappointed in the service   I was in STL on business and was unable to access Wifi in my apartment   Zencity corresponded by email about this  but the issue was never resolved  NOR was there an offer to provide assistance in person   I never did find the router to which they referred   In exchange for this inconvenience  I requested   night reimbursement when I checked out a day early  this was just   night out of total   night stay    This request was denied citing  contract agreement    That is poor customer service in my opinion   I wont stay at another B B operated by Zencity

Nice enough place  but it is not what it looks like online  The building has a strong smell of marijuana and walls are really thin so that you hear neighbors a lot  Didn t feel very clean to me  Location is about all this place has going for it  Wouldn t stay here again
Outstandingly clean   in a great location to walk to any of the touristy locations  Would visit and stay here again  Thank you for an incredibly easy   memorable stay

This place was not kept up and kind of dirty  The pictures made it look much better than it actually was  There were things hanging off screws in the walls  dirt coming out of the bathroom vent  a red and brown stained tub and shower curtain  black marks all over the walls  the place just didnt feel kept up  It definitely seems like a place that a corporation owns and no individual actually sees it  Some more upkeep of the property would be beneficial  It just didnt feel like it was in good shape    and it felt very dirty
Nice homey atmosphere  Enjoyed my stay here  I felt very at home  Safe and beautiful apartment  Nice restaurants behind it on Euclid  Parked in garage a half block away
Cozy and quaint place to stay in the city  Great hosts who are amazing with communicating needs and wants or to lend a hand at any time  Highly recommended  Thank you guys so much for everything
Thank you for hosting my family
Very good place  close to the Gateway Arch  Quiet all the time
Can t beat the location   Food options and Forest Park options with a couple blocks  The building is a little dated and bathrooms could use some work  But all in all a pleasant stay
Amazing place  Would recommend to anyone   Amazing property  Everything about th  stay was fantastic  Wish there was a quicker way to unlock the door but that s just me being picky  Great job

Everything we needed was already provide right there for us  We didn t have to worry about anything and the whole process was so easy  It was so neat and clean very quiet for the location and finding parking was very nice and easy  Not to far from everywhere we needed to be
The apartment is accurate to it s description the check in process was nice and smooth I recommend The stay was really nice and smooth thank you

Good location  clean  pictures matched what we saw and the communication was always prompt  Would stay here again  Thank you for letting us stay here  Overall it was a pleasant stay  It was a bit confusing trying to find the room initially  but we managed and we had no issues the rest of the stay

Nice space  will need salt  pepper  dish soap    laundry soap  The pool is a wading pool  completely metal lined  so be careful  but perfect for lounging and chatting  The key tag wouldnt open the garage gate ever  had to wait for front desk person to answer call button to open it  Also  you must have a tag to exit the building which was challenging as you are leaving the key inside the space at check out  I did appreciate the space  had a lovely stay  the black out curtains were amazing  beds comfortable  and the walk in closet was ridiculously large  The key tag wouldnt work to exit the garage  and in order to exit the building you have to have a key tag  This made it difficult to get to the garage to leave after leaving the key at check out  The space was very nice  there werent many towels  however there was laundry  Unfortunately there was no dish soap  or laundry soap  There was an empty container of ALL on top of the laundry machines  Overall  it was a nice space  however communication at check out wasnt very speedy  Still waiting a response regarding my blow dryer that was left behind

Great Location  Great accommodations and a very clean place  Check in Check out  is not complicated   Host are extremely good with communicating back  The only issue was not having a dedicated parking spot  however there are tons on street parking spots  I will definitely stay again and recommend  Your place was extremely efficient   The location was great and the accommodations were perfect and met my needs  The only mishap was the opened bag of chips that we discussed  im pretty sure this was a little mistake and not the normal   The only improve that I could possible think of would to be including a parking spot  Parking on the street  finding parking can be a bit hectic    All in all  we enjoyed our stay and will definitely book again

Would stay here again  Comfortable bed  great front desk staff  awesome location  absolutely quiet even on a Friday night  Seems larger in person than in the photos  Rooftop views were gorgeous   didnt spend much time up there  but wished we could have  We got lucky with street parking and only paid for two hours of a meter on Sunday morning with the rest of our stay finding free spots  Theres a drive in front of the building so you can load a car if need be when leaving   Only eh was that the living room smelled the faintest bit like smoke  think its due to the window A C unit   cant do much about that   Im sensitive to that sort of thing  but it didnt bother me too much and wasnt present in the bedroom or bathroom
Great location overlooking Forest Park Thanks  ZenCity staff

The room that I slept in was very warm  there s only one A C unit in the living room for the entire Unit  It does get noisy in the area throughout the night  make sure to bring white noise  Parking can be an issue  but street parking isn t monitored after  p to  am  but if you need to park there during the day  be prepared to find a garage or pay for street parking    Other than that  it was a cute apartment  but I won t be booking again because of the parking issue  The room that I slept in was very warm  there s only one A C unit in the living room for the entire Unit  It does get noisy in the area throughout the night  make sure to bring white noise  Parking can be an issue  but street parking isn t monitored after  p to  am  but if you need to park there during the day  be prepared to find a garage or pay for street parking    Other than that  it was a cute apartment  but I won t be booking again because of the parking issue

No free parking        great location The bathtub backs up and needs to be snaked or plunged  filter in AC needs changed  When you advertise     night and it ends up being       thats very misleading  And the parking situation needs to be said Up Front  not after Ive already paid for it  because that added more
Great location  neighbors are nice as well  Thank you for the stay

A good base of operations for a stay in Hyde Park   this lovely pedestrian friendly neighborhood is loaded with parks and pocket gardens   The apartment was nicely laid out and easy to access   Appliances and furnishings were all up to date and clean  It was terrific to see a full length mirror   I think the blinds should be replaced with something that blocks out the outdoor lighting better   We are southerners and the heat seemed too hot at night   We did not open windows b c of outside noise   Also  the living room couch could be longer so occupants can sleep nap separately if desired   But  the proximity to travel and shopping and my daughters apartment was the main selling point of this apartment for us   We would stay here again
Nice place  Would definitely stay here again Entry is sort of difficult

Pro  The location of the apartment was great  Directly across the street from Forest Park  Lime scooters in front of the building  lots of restaurants to choose from  and a   min walk to the link for easy access to downtown  Whole Foods and another small gourmet grocery store are only a few blocks away  Pro  The rooftop terrace was great for evening sunsets  absolutely beautiful  Pro  The apartment closely matched the pictures and AC worked great in     degree temperatures  Con  The check in procedure did not go well  no access to lockbox and no answer from customer service  Building concierge is not able to assist  Eventually  ZenCity resolved issue  but over an hour after arrival  Con  The WiFi access given did not work  only showed up as an available connection on the last day  Workaround was using modem directly  All in all  I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone traveling in the area  I mentioned this in the checkout text  but the check in process did not go well for us  The lockbox code was not sent via email and there was no way to get into the apartment for over an hour  The customer service number was not answered until we picked option    third party calling on behalf of a client  The front desk staff of the building is not able to help  and is not present to answer any questions after hours  Another couple checking in at    pm was not able to find the lockbox and their code did not work   They also did not receive an answer to their call to CS until we told them to pick the third party option  The concept is great but there needs to be a backup plan for access   Also the router was not functioning  so we directly used the modem for internet access  This may be problematic for anyone without tech skills

Great location for a reasonable price  There is nothing fancy about the unit but it was easy to get to and access  fit our group of   adults   a baby well  and has a washer dryer available  Lots of restaurants within walking distance and conveniently located for driving  More convenient than a   star hotel but definitely has its own set of quirks to adjust to  Great location  There was a sewage y smell throughout the apartment the entire time that went a long way from preventing us from loving the place  it was also not particularly clean  missing grout in the bathroom  stains on the area rug  etc   The bottle cap keeping a table level was tough since we couldnt leave it on the floor to do its job with an infant around  but the table was very tippy without it  All in all  it was fine for the price and the location but it was clear that this is not a meticulously maintained unit

Nice studio right on the university of chicago campus  plenty of places nearby for coffee or food  I enjoyed my stay and it was in a nice part of town but i wish it was cleaner  When i walked in on the first day i noticed change on the ground  then i noticed that there was also loose hairs on the sheets that were clearly visible  There were also hairs in the towels and there was hair in the shower and there was urine underneath the toilet seat  Then on the second day of my stay i found an open box of condoms in the drawer next to the bed so that was cool

The apartment was not as clean as we thought it should be  The side bed tables had food particles on both of them  The remotes did not look clean  The floors were sticky  My husband and I we re here for his oncology treatment so he has a compromised immune system  I went to the store to buy disinfectant wipes and wiped things done  The bathroom was clean though  The apartment was close to the hospital so that was very nice and convenient  We wish there was better parking as I had to park   blocks away to find free parking as we were there   days  Other than that  we enjoyed our stay   Thank you again

Nice location near Union Station and not all that far from the Arch and ballpark area either  The room was spacious and clean and I liked that the tv had Netflix and several other streaming apps ready to view  Would be nice to have a disposable parking pass so that when I left I didn t have to go get my car and they park and return to the room to drop off the parking pass  Though I realize that is probably something you can t control

We had to call literally    times but we finally got a hold of someone on the   th try  the original passcode given was wrong and we were giving so many wrong pass codes after before getting a correct one which kind of made us hesitant to leave afraid we would get locked out and not be able to get a hold of someone  Outside of the actual room we stayed in the building smells horrible  like urine
Was a great place  Everything you need  Great having a washer and dryer as well    Thanks so much worked out great for us

This was a bad stay for me  I expected to fully enjoy my weekend vacation  but yet found out that I would end up dealing with clear procedural failures of the property owners    On the Positive    the place was clean and welcoming  On the negative  Be prepared to find somewhere else to sleep if any situation happens to your room key  and you get to the facility during the off hours of the front desk attendant   After a night out on the town  my key FOB fell out of my pocket in the uber during the ride home  Shortly there after  my cell phone died  Thus I was limited to contacting the Zencity through the buildings call box  However  come to find out  the building has no front desk support  nor anyone available to let guest gain entry into the building  Therefore  using the call box  transfers you to other front desk attendants located in the apartment buildings near by  I attempted to call Zencity      times using the call box and received no reply  Finally I tried the front desk and was able to reach the   other nearby front desk workers  Who again noted  that they would be unable to  provide me access  One attendant was able to reach a Zencity representive on the hotel landline after I walked over there to meet him  Although  the rep was  sympathetic and understanding to my situation  he still could not provide me access to the building nor the room  The      on call building technician was called repeatable and never answered the phone  Thus  the only result for me to gain access to the building would be waiting until      am until the front desk representative got to work  This resulted in me sleeping on the sofa of the adjacent building for several hours until  am    When  am came  I approached the front desk which was able to open the lobby doors for me  but had no idea who can or how to access the spare room key   SN  I was finally able to charge my phone and confirmed the FOB was left in the Uber at this time  However  the driver would not be available until the afternoon to bring the key   The attendant contacted the      tech who finally picked up and came  However  for some reason he forgot to bring the key himself and I was told that he wont be back for an hour  Now its closing in on  am  and I was finally able to reach a Zencity rep over the phone who can provide me a solution  The rep was able to remotely open a lock box that for some magically reason no one else knew excised  and contained a secondary master key that would open my guest suite   Ultimately  this was a horrible stay for me  I will never stay with this provider  or do I recommend anyone else making that choice  Not negating my responsibility of losing the  key FOB temporarily  However  I did not foresee the only solution would be to sleep in a neighboring buildings sofa as the solution  It was one of the most embarrassing feelings watching people walk by possibility thinking who is this bum on the couch  knowing I paid a considerable amount for a bed  Furthermore  I happy that i attended this vacation by myself and not with my family  I cant even imagine paying for an AirBNB only to watch my kids sleep on a couch for hours because Zencity does not have a plan in place for lost keys   Lets be real  you can purchase a cheaper hotel and ensure at least they have a procedure in place to make accommodations for entry  at the minimum  unto the property    Like I said earlier the place was clean  but the service was beyond poorly planned and executed  Develop a process that allows people the ability to enter the facility and access the property

Wonderful location and very nice accommodations  Had a great stay  The only thing that we would change is that the love seat in the living area was incredibly uncomfortable  A couple of concrete blocks would be better  LOL  We had a great stay though and really enjoyed the accommodations  Thank you for everything

The place was clean and the game room in the building was super cool  We used Uber for most of our transportation and didn t pay more than     for each ride  but the metro is also an option  If you plan on cooking anything  make sure you make a list of everything you need because there are zero essential grocery items   not even cooking spray    they do provide all the cooking ware you ll need though   Other than the lack of basic grocery items  the place was great and very clean  Would definitely recommend staying here The place was great  just would have been nice if there were the basic groceries condiments provided  It was a pain to have to purchase the bare minimum to then just throw them all away  Also the outlet in the room close to the closet didn t work for some reason

Was a great location and a beautiful apartment  Easy check in and great restaurant on the main floor  We did have issues with noise  thin walls and ceiling  we heard upstairs walking around and at about  AM were startled awake by yelling in the hallway  It was a great spot and a lovely location  Accommodated my last minute booking which I appreciated  I did ask and request an earlier check in and it said it was approved but then was told not tell    We just had issues with loud yelling in the hallways at  AM

Always a pretty good stay with Zencity   clear instructions good unit from time to time theres a small issue but thats going to happen  The door knob on one bedroom is broken and there was a lot of gnats in kitchen

Perfect for a quick overnight stay during a cross country trek  as it was very close to the interstate  Great location close to Forest Park  easy to find on street parking  and the Whole Foods right across the street was super convenient  The studio was simple and clean  Comfortable bed and quiet so got a great nights sleep  Thanks for everything  It was a great location and it ended up being super easy to park overnight  In case its a continuing issue  you might want to tell people about the back entrance  I just lucked out with the guy who showed me  Also it was closer to the parking spots so easier to bring bags in  There was definitely an odd odor in the bathroom that I think was just from not enough ventilation  Noticed that the fan was pretty blocked up with dust  Tried to  clear it out a little and that helped a bit  but definitely needs to be checked  Overall though  it was great and I really loved being close to Forest Park

My husband and I went there for our anniversary and loved the place it was a beautiful apartment very clean and a absolutely wonderful  The neighborhood we were was a fun and had everything from restaurants art to bars and we were close to everything downtown we are absolutely reserving this place again when we are back in the city it was a wonderful experience and the host was very friendly  I really enjoyed your place and will absolutely be recommending it to others and hopefully we ll be back

Trust these reviews  Just dont book here  The unit was FILTHY  Hair on the bathroom walls  Toilette had a dirty ring  Dirty rags in the bathroom  Rug was FILTHY  Wall were filthy  Obvious ceiling leakage in the kitchen  The unit you see here is NOT the unit you get  The only plus is the location  Yall are dead wrong that place is filthy and those pictures are not of that unit

If you stay at this Airbnb you ll not only love the great location  and stunning rooftop views  but the staff is in my opinion is top notch  We checked in at  pm on Monday the  th  the doorman   please forgive me I can t remember this sweet souls name  was the most above board enthusiastic  positive  and outgoing  He should us how to use the keyfobs and told us if we needed anything to let him know  I would definitely stay a       if I could leave ten stars I could                       The door man when we checked in at    pm on Monday the  th was the most welcoming man  So helpful and always remembered my son and that he was in the hospital  He definitely deserves a fat raise

The apartment appeared very similar to the photos posted   It was tidy and professional   However  it hadnt been properly clean   There was a significant amount of dirt  food scraps  crumbs  etc  on the main carpet and entry way  empty bottles of shampoo conditioner in the shower  and a lot of hair in the bathroom     I wasnt happy   I emailed management and they said they would send someone over to clean   Nobody ever came   To make matters worse  management sent me an email asking if I would like to pay      extra to have the space  freshened up    I expected it to be fresh in the first place   I shouldnt have to pay extra to have a clean space     The building is located right next to a hospital and extremely loud ambulances and sirens drove by all night long   I was shocked at how loud it was and had to wear ear plugs and keep the AC running to sleep through the night     Parking near the building was also a nightmare and added an additional headache and cost to the stay   I wouldnt stay there again or recommend it to a friend

My bf and I booked this during our drive to St  Louis  roadtripped east to west   nd stop  so excited to stay based on location and since it was labeled super host  When we arrived it was around       and the check in app didn t work door man had to give us a key  When we got up there it was absolutely gross  Stuff on the bed and floors  black hairs   Had taken pics and sent to zen city in which they only would refund me     of the clean fee which was literally only       I messaged regarding my concern again hence we didn t even stay there that night  And no response not even the small refund  Moral of the story I had to reach out to Airbnb directly  Poor communication I appreciate the efforts however your communication was awful and required me to go through air bnb directly  Very disappointed with what you considered clean and a fair refund

We did not enjoy our stay here  The bed was extremely uncomfortable and bedroom was very hot and customer service refused to help the AC issue  The building smells of smoke constantly  although a  non smoking  community  Appliances were not working and the window shades offered no privacy or light darkening  The d cor and location were nice  but not worth the other downfalls  We had an awful experience here  The bed was extremely uncomfortable   especially since the bedroom was not cooling properly  No one helped me when I complained regarding the cooling issue  Also  the washing machine and dishwasher were not working  The washing machine would start to run water then quit  the dishwasher would not close the compartment that the pod goes in  The hallways smelled bad of cigarette and marijuana smoke in the building  The blinds in the apartment do not provide privacy or block the light

The location of this AirBnB was excellent  as it was close to Forest Park and great local restaurants   Unfortunately  I cannot recommend this listing due to two main issues  lack of communication from the host concerning check in and the cleanliness of the apartment   With respect to check in  the hosts initial message upon booking stated that they would send check in information a few days in advance   They did not   I messaged the host when I was about an hour away from St  Louis to ask for check in information   They did not respond   It was not until about three hours later  when my family was standing outside the apartment building and calling the number  that we finally got the code to the building and apartment   It was getting to be late at night at that point  and we were concerned we would have to cancel the booking and secure a last minute hotel room   Second  although the apartment was architecturally interesting  it was not clean   The wood floors were sticky  the carpets and furniture were stained  and there was visible dirt hair dust along the trim  baseboards  and in the corners   The kitchen sink faucet was also broken   I wanted to like the apartment  but these issues would cause me not to stay here again

The unit was spacious and was within walking distance to the Arch  The unit was not very clean  The laminate floors were dirty and the carpet had a lot of hair in it  Also  I had a few issues with my stay and the time it took for Zencity to respond and resolve the issues was not appropriate  I have been home   days and am still waiting for a response  I am disappointed about my experience with Zencity

Great spot  nice accommodations    Cons   I had a week long thing at the convention center  and it was a bit of an inconvenient walk in the summer heat    Scooters are the way to go    There is only one key card which gives you access to the elevator and the garage   Since there was more than one person in my group this became a significant inconvenience     Pros   The apartment is very spacious and sparsely appointed  which is a good thing imo    It was incredibly clean and well taken care of   There are plenty of good spots for eating  drinking  and sightseeing within walking  running  or scootering distance    I loved having an indoor gym for a rainy days and the included parking spot was a huge advantage      Took me most of the week before I realized there was a good coffee shop IN THE BUILDING   Which is awesome  wish Id have known sooner  Great spot  nice accommodations   The lack of a second key card was a significant challenge for us   I loved having an indoor gym for a rainy day and an included parking spot was a huge advantage

Great place to stay  Centrally located  safe  wide open windows with a gorgeous skyline view  and lots of amenities  The kitchen was stocked with pretty much anything you might need to cook your own meals  and there were fun bonuses like a rooftop pool  The host was available to answer questions  Definitely recommend staying here  We had a great stay in your apartment  Thank you for all the amenities provided and the quick response to our question  Everything was so beautiful  clean  and comfortable   One suggestion we have is to provide a second key so that more than one guest can leave at different times during the day  However  the backup access was certainly adequate  It just made things a little more complicated for four guests  Also  we had three towels for four guests  so we ended up buying one
This place was unclean

I had a terrible experience    Problems      The  smart  lock on the door was unable to lock itself  This left us with no way to lock the door from the outside  ZenCity had no solutions for this  no interest in helping us  and after an unbelievably Kafkaesque conversation with ZenCity we gave up  We had to take everything with us in our car the when we weren t in the apartment and just leave the apartment sitting unlocked the entire day       The washer was broken  In the midst of our   hour attempt to get ZenCity to do ANYTHING about the lock  we decided to wash some clothes  The washer filled with water and then promptly stopped  The dryer wouldn t turn on either  Now  we are sitting in an apartment we cannot lock with a washer full of soaked  dirty clothes  It was around this time that ZenCity stopped responding entirely  We had to wring our clothes out in the sink and go to the laundromat at the crack of dawn the next day    The short of it  the apartment is fine if everything works  But if it doesn t  no one will help you  And you will drive yourself crazy trying to get even a response from ZenCity  And after hours of sending messages  ruined clothes scattered around you  you will get a two sentence response like     Sorry to hear you are having trouble  Just know that this is not the usual experience of ZenCity guests    Well good for those other guests  Maybe they can come over and help me wring my dirty clothes into the sink
Awesome location with great views of downtown  Awesome place  If I m ever in the area again it ll be my first choice

Thank you for hosting my first visit to St  Louis  My son and I enjoyed our stay and will always choose Zen City for future trips there   The temperature was too cold for me and it would ve been nice to be able to adjust the thermostat  Thank you again  Thank you for hosting my first visit to St  Louis  My son and I enjoyed our stay and will always choose Zen City for future trips there   The temperature was too cold for me and it would ve been nice to be able to adjust the thermostat  Thank you again

Reviews are accurate  GREAT location  BEAUTIFUL apartment  amazing view  I had the easiest time getting into the building  Parking was no problem at all  However  definitely found multiple types  and strands  of hair on the sheets and pillows  So much so that my   year old son had random hairs in his diaper  I had to lay my own blanket on the bed to sleep on it  and pulled the sheets off before leaving in hopes that would encourage them to put clean ones on for the next guest  I also had to wipe my babys feet off both nights of my stay before bed due to all the dirt that got on him while he crawled on the floor  Still a BEAUTIFUL experience and the view and pool are extravagant amenities  I would definitely stay again  Just be sure to bring extra covers  your own towels  and shoes to wear while you walk around  there is different strands of hair all over the sheets  please just start changing the sheets  people could have had sex on those sheets and a child could be laying in that mess the next day

My wife and I took a family trip with our two small children to St  Louis  The place itself is not bad at all and its in a great location  However  it wasnt clean well and we had a particularly negative experience to mention  Our first night there as we were going to bed  I noticed a wet spot on my side  It was not wet on top where the comforter was  it was deep in the mattress and fitted sheet  I smelled it and it was definitely urine  Thankfully  I found a waterproof mattress cover in the closet and put it on  otherwise I would have been on the floor  My wife emailed the rental company that night and they got back with us the following day  They said they would clean the issue and have it taken care of that day  We came back that evening after being gone all day to find new sheets on the bed  However  the urine stain in the mattress had not been clean and was still wet and seeping through the new sheets  We called them back and asked for them to address the issue asap  They told us we could leave and get half off the second night  and still have to pay for the clean fee  but with two little kids and it being late  this was not an option for us  I put the mattress cover back on and we left the next day  I subsequently called their company at least   times and could never get through to a manager  They kept saying they were reviewing our complaints and after about   weeks  they were willing to give us a discount on our stay  The whole experience was quite unpleasant  I do appreciate them ultimately making things right but their communication with guests and ability to address problems is quite terrible

My stay would have been great if I was a ale to conduct business as usual during my stay  Not only did I not have Wifi  as listed   but I had to jump through hoops to contact customer service and when I did  they couldn t help  I didn t get a follow up until   am the following morning after sending a message at   pm    Elevator also didn t work so I had to climb up and down   flights of stairs with my luggage My stay would have been great if I was a ale to conduct business as usual during my stay  Not only did I not have Wifi  but I had to jump through hoops to contact customer service and when I did  they couldn t help  I didn t get a follow up until   am the following morning after sending a message at   pm

Really easy to contact host  Location is great for visiting downtown for a ballgame  the arch  the Dome  etc  Apartment and building had an odor of smoke  We bought a candle and lit it during our stay and that helped  Kitchen is not fully stocked to be able to really cook a meal  No skillets  cutting board  cutting knives  Just not what we have been used to with Airbnb s  Location was perfect for our needs  Host was easy to contact when we had a problem with check in

Biggest frustration is being charged full price after having a delayed check in  when I d asked to get in a bit early  months in advance     Otherwise the place was where it said it d be  relatively clean  Had some broken blinds and a cheap couch  but not a big deal  Value wasn t great   but needed a place to stay in the area and it worked well enough  Biggest frustration is being charged full price after having a delayed check in  when I d asked to get in a bit early  months in advance

The elevators in the building can be expected not to work  The entire building is old and unmanaged  The trash by all other residents gets piled up by the only exterior door that works and you have to walk over it to get in the building  There is no parking that is offered by the tenant  The room is hot  one ac unit is not enough  It is close to everything in the central west end  but at the price point  I would have spent a significant amount more to have something nicer or I wouldve been happier in a hotel  I would highly suggest a better clean method  The amount of dirt and dust was outrageous  If you arent going to add an AC unit  I would suggest mentioning that the room can get quite hot  If its going to be the bare apartment that it is  at least have a luxury item so people have some things to overlook  Coffee  coffee pot  some decently comfortable seating  ect

Ive been using airbnb for years and this the worst experience Ive had this far   Zencity was absolutely awful at communication   The wifi didnt work and when I asked about it I got multiple different wifi networks with a different passwords every time they responded  none of them worked   I was never able to connect to wifi and missed out on work and money due to this   When I notified them of this and the fact I was filing a complaint they stopped responding completely until they gave me checkout directions   The place smelled like rotten eggs  there was throw up on the wall in the kitchen  and there werent any towels left to shower with   I had to go purchase towels to shower   Awful experience  do not stay here

We had a great time staying here in St  Louis  Some minor issues getting checked in  but we got answers pretty quickly and were able to settle in  The apartment was as pictured  The parking garage isn t too far and having the parking space was super great  Parking in downtown is not easy  Seems like the owners are not in town and it creates some mostly minor but annoying issues  Check in was a little tricky with the key box outside and the code on the outside door not working  There are exterior doors on the east and west side of the building and the lock box was on the east side  But walking up from parking garage we went to west doors    The emailed instructions referenced a gravel lot on one side of the building but there isn t a gravel lot  That created some confusion about being at the correct place    The long code for the door lock is annoying    The cleanliness of the shower could use a little attention  One of the lamps was broke  bulb burned out in another and the blinds were broken    We still did enjoy our stay   I m just picky

Good  The apartment itself looks just like the pictures  its well stocked in kitchen supplies  and is the perfect amount of space for     people  Messaging response time on Airbnb was quick and the people at Zencity I spoke to were very friendly   Bad  My check in experience was not ideal  The code that I was given for the self service kiosk did not work and when I called the support line  it took    minutes to get resolved  I was on hold first and then had to wait while they remotely unlocked the locker with my key   While communication from Zencity through Airbnb messaging was pretty quick  they did not fully answer the questions I had and I was left without answers or had to repeat my questions   Neutral  There is no guaranteed parking available with this property  I rented a car and was gone for most of the day between   am and   pm  which is when the paid  two hour parking near the property is enforced   For the few hours I did pay for parking in the evening when I got back  parking was cheap and readily available  I parked max   blocks away  and then I was able to leave my car on the street overnight  As another option  there are also parking garages for the hospital nearby but I didnt utilize those options

This place was so nice   It was spacious and very clean  The communication was great  We even got a text to let us know the water was shut off in the city  We were out  so it didn t affect us  We really enjoyed our stay  We will definitely use Zencity again  Thanks so much for allowing us to stay at your place  It was spacious and very clean  The communication was great  We even got a text to let us know the water was shut off in the city  We were out  so it didn t affect us  We really enjoyed our stay  Thanks again   The only downfall was microwave did not work the last day there  It was something going on in the breaker box

Great location  The tub wasn t clean   lots of hair left in it  Also  there was no mattress pad  We eventually found it folded up in the closet on the last day  but it really needs to be on the bed before guests come
he will charge your account for EVERYTHING   still havekey fob becauseIm too uncomfortable to return it    HATED IT
Great place to stay  Sorry if I spell this wrong but Teiler at the front desk was the best  Very nice and so helpful always

My husband   I had such a great stay here for our first time ever in St Louis  Not only was it a beautiful building   apartment that looks exactly as is in the photos but it s a quick walk in a very safe  beautiful neighborhood to the supermarket  coffee shop  brewery and more  Deff recommend

This apartment was in an older building in the Central West End  so some aspects of the building and the unit are somewhat dated  but they did a good job of modernizing the apartment  All in all  the apt came across as advertised  Great location for exploring Forest Park  The apartment itself was nice  I m not sure if I overlooked this in the instructions  but the front entrance to the building was completely under construction so we had to figure out how to use the side way  This wasn t an issue once we found it but might be nice to give people a heads up for the time being  The place was lovely  Thanks

I wasn t very happy here  There s a smell in the building and lots of drug deals in the elevators and will take place regardless if you are there or not  The parking location is down a couple blocks and hard to access  There were roaches on the walls and on the cabinets  I sent pictures but no actions were taken and they weren t addressed via phone text or in the app until I followed up  I always have a good reviews so this is a first for me but wanted to let others know  Pretty disappointing overall   The shower head is not secure  there are roaches  I sent pictures  Lots of drug deals and smoking  The door to the patio doesn t have a lock  Seems like someone could drop climb the balcony but maybe that s just me  It was an odd feeling to know it was unlocked though  This was my second multi day stay with Zencity just this month

Nice little spot in a great neighborhood of Chicago   It is walking distance to the lake and all the great restaurants and shops of Hyde Park  including Whole Foods  Close to the museum and U of Chicago  There is also a cute little park right outside that is really quiet and serene   The entrance is a little funky so be sure to get dropped off on the Hyde Park Blvd side  This is a really nice apartment to stay for a few days  Thank you for the apartment  There was some confusion about the two entrances as AirBnb lists the address on the Madison Park Entrance  And your instructions listed the other side so we had to walk around with all our luggage  When we got to the room  the code did not work since we had arrived one day late   We were able to call and get reset but it did add a level of stress to the whole check in process    Once we got in  everything was fine and we love the neighborhood

No parking and wished the beds had been a  little higher   Great having a washer and dryer   There was a parking lot real close that was reasonable   Location was great  No parking and wished the beds had been a  little higher   Great having a washer and dryer   There was a parking lot real close that was reasonable   Location was great

All in all  its a great property at a great price in a convenient location   I enjoyed sitting on the big front porch and taking in the neighborhood  Our hosts were accessible and promptly responded to our messages  All in all  its a great property at a great price in a convenient location   Your instructions were clear and detailed   Your handbook on points of interest was very helpful   I enjoyed sitting on the porch and taking in the neighborhood   The upstairs toilet generated weak flushes so we avoided using it  I would have communicated this to you during our stay but Im not technically adept enough to navigate the airbnb app over my mobile phone  All my communications with you have been through my desktop at home   Im    with an arthritic knee and I would have found a handrail for the front porch steps helpful   though I dont know how that would affect the aesthetics of the house   We had three family members to the house on Saturday night for pizza and everyone enjoyed the visit   I would definitely recommend your property to my friends  I dont care about such things  but I read that there would be refreshments in the bedside mini fridge upstairs but it was empty  and there was a circular  residue stain on one of the empty shelves

The apartment was nice and as pictured  It was plenty of space for our group of    Our group included   adults and a   year old and at no point did we feel on top of each other when lounging around the apartment    The issues  there were a couple     The garage card didn t work  We had to push the help button and wait several minutes every time we entered and left the garage  Annoying  but bearable for a weekend stay      We were only given   bath towels for our group of   for the weekend  There were plenty of pillows  sheets and covers  however  bath towels were scarce    Overall  we enjoyed our stay  The building residents we encountered were all quite friendly  The front desk staff was helpful and the location was good for our needs during our stay  The key fob to the garage didn t work  The front desk attendant told us that maintenance would need to reset it but it probably wouldn t happen during our stay  Also  we had a party of   and were only given   bath towels for showering and the pool

The place is nice  clean and in a good location   It was hard to sleep at night due to the loud noise at night from neighbors and people downstairs  That s something to be mindful for  Also  parking is not included so you either have to park on the meters or parking garage nearby  We parked at Barnes Jewish Hospital and paid     per night  I would like to suggest offering a parking voucher for the guests or adding it to the cost  We had a child with a wheelchair and it was very inconvenient having to park at quite a distance  We wish that it was included in the description that parking was not included with this property   Another side notes  we found hair on our sheets which made us feel uncomfortable to use them  It made us wonder if the sheets were changed from the previous guests

The front desk staff is awesome  Teeler  not sure on the spelling  was so nice  Just a pleasure to talk to and very helpful  The location is perfect  We had no issue parking  Found a free spot each time we returned  The rooftop view is gorgeous  Walking distance to great restaurants  bars  and coffee shops  I  highly recommend this place  Great place

The room was great to stay in  though I had a hard time getting in contact with the host  The front door is currently under construction  not sure for how much longer  so I had to find a side door on my own  The room itself had everything I needed for a single nights stay in St  Louis though  and the location is great for traveling around the city without a car  Hi  I was overall happy with my stay  but a few things stood out to me  It was difficult getting in touch with the host  Ava  I had messaged a couple of times  and received no response   And still havent   The wifi password written in the room and in Avas instructions were incorrect  and I only got the correct password when I received an automated response after messaging Ava about it  Also  there was no mention that the front door to the building was being renovated  so it took me a long time to find the side door entrance  I was glad that the passcode was the same for the side door  but I was frustrated that it took so long

We really enjoyed this place  The building does smell like cigarettes and marijuana  but it s not necessarily in the unit itself  The bed was amazingly comfortable  The restaurant downstairs was great and there s a store across the street for snacks or other things you might ve forgot  There s also a parking garage across the street  Overall  we enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again  Also  it s only about a    minute walk to the baseball stadium and lots of amazing restaurants there too  We really enjoyed the stay  I appreciate when someone adjusted the thermostat for us  Something to possibly look into  there is a crack in the tub and the light over the sink didn t work  I m not a super picky person so I don t care but thought I d let you know  Also  maybe some plug in air fresheners could help offset the smell of weed and cigarettes from the rest of the building  Overall  the rest was great

Spacious and great location to things to see and do  Parking is super secure  Instructions for parking and the door lock weren t very clear  The parking was not explained to me in a way that I understood  It s free if you know how it works  You ll literally be stuck inside the parking garage if you lose the paper ticket that you never even needed if you knew how the parking worked  Instructions could have been provided as the front desk lady was new  The door lock on the door to the unit was confusing when you ve never seen one like that before  The elevators had to be explained by a tenant  The furniture is cheaply made and a couch leg broke off on the first day there  The towel holder in the master bath was already broken out of the wall   Overall very clean but there was some spots on the furniture that I could tell had stuff on them  body fluids idk   Good location and the unit was spacious  The beds and linens were very nice and comfortable  The washer and dryer were convenient and handy

we enjoyed our stay in the Hyde Park property   the piano was an unexpected surprise  lovely flowers in the front yard  hi slawik  we enjoyed our stay and it was probably an unusual oversight but closer attention to your clean crew after they finish might be wise   outside garage  washing machine had wet clothes in it  ie dirty freezer and dirty dishes in the oven

This place is walking distance to some pretty dope food spots  Pretty central location  not too far from the things you would want to do while in town  Cool place to stay for a short stay in St  Louis  You should really change the air filter in the air conditioner in the room  the air hardly worked and had the room pretty hot  Also pour some draino down the tub because it floods badly while showering  Also fix the lock on the door  using the key was alright in its place but for check in the code not working was a pain
