The location was excellent  and the apartment was very well equipped  While I did feel like it was clean  there were dirty areas  and hair in the bathroom floor  This would not have been a dealbreaker for me  The building itself was nice when you walk in  but when we actually got off on the floor there were discarded torn up mattresses right outside the elevator and it looked like a pretty rough place  This could ve just been somebody moving out  but it also had a high smell of marijuana  Not a big deal except that I don t smoke anything and I don t care for the smell  The lobby of the building was lovely though as with the apartment    The communication with the house manager was excellent and the check in process was flawless  The beds were comfortable  and the window unit air conditioners kept the temperature of the place perfect  It was close to everything  Parking was about a block away as stated by somebody else but this was not a big deal for us  We just unloaded everything at the front of the building and then came back down and moved the car without any issue  You will need to go to the room before you park the car in the garage because your parking pass is located inside the room    The kitchen was very well equipped  and I would say this place would comfortably sleep    I would rent from ZenCity again without hesitation  The house was excellent

The trip was great  Location was great  Thank you  It was a great trip  We think the app that we were told about  when we called about not being able to get in  should be told about from the beginning  It was easier than typing in the password each time
Would recommend and or stay again

Overall  our stay was a mixed experience  There are many great things about the unit  It is clean  well decorated  and well stocked with amenities  The location is central and there is great access to street parking  Further  the rooftop patio is wonderful   we ate many meals up there and admired the views of the city and the park  However  there was a very serious issue with our stay  When we turned on the oven  the apartment filled with gas  This not only meant that we were unable to cook  but it was also dangerous  Despite bringing the issue to the host s attention on the first night  it was not resolved at any point during our week long stay  Further  much of the communication we received from the host was irrelevant or unhelpful to solving the issue  We were disappointed with the inability to cook and concerned about safety  but had the issues been resolved we would have recommended the unit with enthusiasm  We really wanted to like this apartment  However  the broken and dangerous oven  alongside the lack of helpful communication and especially the lack of resolution of the issue meant that our stay was significantly negatively impacted  In the future  it is important to test and make sure that the appliances function prior to people coming to stay
Very clean and accessible spot  Great parking lot that is safe and protected  Everything you need is pretty much provided in the apartment  Will definitely be back here again when I get the chance

Perfect Budget Room  Quant  Quiet   Zen centric   More for either quick stops just need a good location and a good nights rest  or the adventurer out and about     of the time  The room is perfect with all the necessities  If youre in town and looking for a room under      I think this would do nicely  Also  if youre not from the area and looking for late night eats  try Hooties Burgers  they do not disappoint   Constructive Feedback  I think the filter on the air conditioner may need to be vacuumed replaced  Some dust accumulates around the corners and crevices of the room  I dont mind  but I think it would definitely up the scorecard so to speak  I also found a few dirty dishes and a cracked glass Maybe plastic instead      Positive Feedback  Perfect budget room  pretty close to most  go to  sights  the buildings property is nice  though dont stray too far in the nighttime  I would definitely recommend longer adventurous stays for anyone in the area

the place was amazing and everything I had expected and more  The only issue was  that the washer was not working Hi  Thanks for letting us stay the place was amazing  My only complaint is that the washer was not working

Very central location and great place to stay  Felt like it was our own home with plenty of space  Easy check in out process Hi Zencity  sending this note separate as we were able to manage the weekend anyway  the white key fob for the garage parking ticket stand was not working  We had to call into the building each time for them to let us out  I still have a   star review as it wasn t a huge issue but just wanted to let you know for the next guests   Everything else was great and exactly what we were looking for

We were extremely disappointed by the apartment   It was very dirty and in a substandard condition   The amount of dust and dirt indicated that the apartment had not been properly clean for a substantial period of time   There was a large hole in a bathroom wall where there had been a plumbing repair  but no effort had been made to patch the wall   The blinds were broken and filthy  many of the mirrors are so old that you cannot properly see in them  the carpet is filthy and needs to be replaced  and much of the furniture is extremely worn and dirty   In addition  the pictures posted in the advertising by Zencity are of a different apartment and not this one    The apartment does not have cable as advertised but only offers Roku   The Wifi is problematic as it is often goes out   The only positive is the location of the apartment but this is of little solace  given its condition

Great place and stay  Exactly what we expected  Thanks for the stay  If you could add info about the laundry to the listing once it is booked  that might help others in the future  we figured it out but couldnt find any info in the apt or on the listing

Awful service  Had to wait over an hour in the lobby as their check in instructions were incorrect  only to get a call back that there was a key at reception to which no one at front desk knew about  Lock didn t work properly for the rest of our stay despite advising Zencity

When I came to this location there was a  Condemned Building  sign on the front door   After a little investigation I found out that the unit I was in had been condemned be cause a portion of the buildings exterior fell off   It had since been deemed safe for habitation but the unit right next to mine was condemned and there was construction next to and above my unit   It would have been nice to know this in advance from the host but I got no warning this is the situation I was walking into   I work remote and the sound of construction was loud and not conductive to working and video conferencing     The sign in the unit that said when it was last clean said it had been a few months since it was last clean   Also  when I went to take a shower the water in the bathtub first came out brown  the water would not drain and there was hair from a previous person in the tub   I did not take a shower   I also killed a roach that was crawling near the bed when I woke up in the morning   I communicated this to the host and they relocated and upgraded me to a different location    The upgrade and new location was very nice   However  when I checked in one of the door key codes did not work but the door was open so I assumed it was just an oversight   Unfortunately one day I came back to find that the door was locked and the code that I was given by Zencity was not correct and I had to wait for over an hour to get the proper code from a tenant of the building  Zencity was not able to give me the correct code or send any one out to assist me     Overall this was the worst experience I have had with AirBnB   I would not recommend staying with Zencity   Although they do eventually communicate  it takes too long to get the answers you are asking for to make the trip enjoyable  Both locations were not a clean as I would have liked and the amount of runaround I had to deal with really made this trip more stressful than it should have been

This place was clean  had an amazing location and a great price   I had a few critiques  but would still stay there again   The bed linens smelled of BO when we arrived   We quickly stripped the bed  comforter etc when we arrived and threw them in the washer which is provided in the apartment   This took care of the smell  Note on the electronic  you need to pull on the door when unlocking and locking so that the deadbolt locks flush into the door frame   Even with these critiques  I would happily stay here again   You can t beat the value and location   The Bordeaux building is nice and just a short walk to several restaurants  breweries  etc   and a short drive to major attractions such as City Museum  Zoo  Downtown  etc Great overall value  I just wanted to mention a few things   The bed linens reeked of BO   We had to strip the bed and pillow cases and wash them shortly after arriving   The thermostat would not let us heat the apartment when it was a cool night   Lastly  you have to pull on the door when leaving the apartment so the electronic lock will deadbolt flush into the lock and same when you re unlocking   Even with these critiques  it was a great stay

This apartment is a great find  It places you in a part of town that looks sketchy at first  but I had no problems  They provide parking in a private parking garage half a block away  The building the apartment is located in doesnt leave the best first impression  but the apartment itself is fantastic  The noise and smell of the building stops at the door  and you will get a private  quiet stay in this very well kept apartment  The folks at Zencity are attentive and provide very clear instructions for your stay  I would book here again if given the chance  Thanks again for an easy check in and stay

This apartment was a good spot to stay in Downtown STL if youre going to Busch Stadium for some games  The one downside  and it was a big one  is that guests are not allowed to use the thermostat  If you want the temperature adjusted  you have to send a message thru Airbnb to Zencity and they will adjust it for you if they see the message  It didnt always happen  and it was really frustrating  particularly in the middle of the night   Also  be aware that this host is a large company  so various people will be responding to your messages without reading the whole thread first  It gets a bit tedious having to repeat yourself several times   Aside from that  the apartment was lovely and very spacious  Free parking was a huge plus
Very clean   spacious Great space very clean   spacious

Expect only a bed to sleep in and cool coffee table books   No customer service  no salt  pepper  coffee  inadequate soaps   Dont do it  The customer service with Zencity was vastly inconsistent with the usual customer service of AirBnBs  it was absent   I could not reach a person by phone and when using the phone prompts was cut off   There was no response to email messaging  When we entered until we left   days later the place held a mysterious sickly sweet odor  even with the window open all day   There were none of the amenities which would make the kitchen or bathroom really liveable   No salt and pepper  no coffee or tea  and only enough soap and shampoo for one shower   The coffee table books belied the quality and usual  but lacking  warmth of an AirBnB   I would not consider staying there again   BTW   after many dozens of stays globally  Ive never been so disappointed

Please read  If you like beautiful  neat and clean surroundings  this unit will disappoint  I could never recommend this place to anyone at the price I was charged for three nights  I stayed Thursday  th Sunday  th  so I got the weekend rate at      night in addition to the other three fees which brought my total to nearly       Allow me to tell you what I received for        There is no parking  so you have to park on street  We are fine with this  You have to enter three codes to get into the apartment  The second door requires a bit of force to get open   all the while it s buzzing room  The back room door is broken and you can see inside the door  There is no lock and the door does not shut   The oven is so dirty and black with burnt food that wasn t scrubbed away for months  The kitchen trash can  fridge door  and stove tops were not wiped down properly  The floors were not properly clean  There were ants all over the apartment and mainly were seen in the kitchen around the sink and behind the toaster    The shower curtains were not clean  Both were stained and one of them had a spot of what appeared to be blood  The master bath soap dish in the shower had soap residue in it  the tub drained slowly and the sink drained even more slowly    The paint job on the walls is unacceptable  It bleeds onto the baseboards  The walls are also very dirty  Like someone with dirty hands touched them and no one bothered to wipe it off  There is also an uneven texture to the walls  It s not aesthetically pleasing in the least bit  Where the wall meets the floor  there is another lining that is not true base boarding  and it s falling apart and full of what appears to be wood dust    I have taken pictures of everything and will be in touch with the Resolution Center about the lack of cleanliness and poor condition of the apartment  I was mainly in communication with Alejandro and he gave me the runaround for three days and I was completely ignored for an entire day  He offered to send a cleaner over on Saturday at  pm and we were scheduled to leave the next morning at  am  We also had already clean and there was no point  I am pursuing a partial refund  which the  team of managers  has so far agreed to refund the     clean fee  We left the apartment clean and used our own sheets  Hopefully the apartment gets more than a ten minute clean job before the next guest  Please refer to past messages and read my full review  I ll put everything there  I m disappointed in the communication  I was clear and asked to have a productive discussion so we can handle matters in private  You all are well aware of what the unit looks like  so I was hoping for an honest discussion  but here we are   I complained because your unit is sloppily painted  the only couch is stained with God knows what  and your broken blinds have not been replaced  etc  Barely anything has been done to keep this unit aesthetically appealing for guests    My family and I all live I ll definitely recommend this stay clean   nice   comfy     I loved my stay    Highly recommended

close to everything in st louis a little expensive

This is a spacious  light filled apartment with a tasteful  minimalist feel to the furnishings and decor  The bed is as hard as a rock   Im used to a firm mattress  so I would guess this one is extra firm  If youre a stomach or side sleeper  you may want to bring some kind of pillow crate topper with you  Unlike other reviewers  we found the WiFi in this apartment to work great  The big surprise for us was the ongoing construction on the property  which meant jackhammers right outside our window  the apartment is on the  nd floor  all day  every day  starting at      in the morning  The construction has been going on since January of this year and  according to the front desk staff  is expected to go on at least another month or two  If you plan to be out of the apartment during the daytime  this wont be a problem for you  If you plan to rest or do remote work and online meetings during the day  you may need to find another space for that  The front desk staff told us about the WiFi Lounge on the   th floor  which was helpful and had a beautiful view of Forest Park  The rooftop deck is also beautiful and is a nice place to get away from noise  though if you need WiFi  it wont be a place to get work done   The front desk staff was very helpful and very friendly  and the building was safe  clean  and in a perfect location for access to the hospital  the park  and the great dining spots in the CWE
Beautiful   bedroom loft style  great location  I would highly reccomend

First I was a bit upset after I had rented this place for      a night and then see after I had rented it that the price had dropped down to     a night  i have screen shots     The location of the building was not in the location of the map provided  Was in a bad part of town which lots of gun shots were heard  If there was not a private parking lot I probably would not have stayed there   Building reeked of pot smoke all the time  I thought it was a non smoking building  People who had dogs allowed them to go to bathroom on the roof top patio  Nice seeing dog turds on the fake grass   The last night we stayed there which was a Monday night  Young folks had a party on the roof right above us that went until     am   Blaring music and screaming  In the morning the patio was littered with beer cans and wine bottles   The place was clean as advertised

This is basically a clean  nicely staged vacant apartment   There are none of the personal touches or amenities I have become accustomed to experience with AirBnB   No insider guide of where to go for food or recreation   If one was staying here for a week or more  one would be able to exist   but you would have to buy pots and pans to cook   There are plates and silverware  but no sponge  dishcloth or cookware in the apartment   It did the trick for a short trip  and for someone from NYC  the apartment was spacious   From now on  I will look for individuals who host their place There is a foul smell in the building   First it was on the   th floor  smelled it through my mask  and then in the lobby   Check in   well  late at night  I could not see where to enter a combination and the instructions never mention how to make the numbers appear or that one has to also press the   sign after the passcode   Thanks for leaving a coffee carafe  would have been nice to have coffee and or cream on hand   No dishwashing liquid  or sponge to clean dishes

Well designed  comfortable  and well situated  If you expect to watch TV  you MUST BRiNG with you any access codes to the apps shown on the TV otherwise you will be unable to watch TV  We did not know this  Whoever designed the redo of this apartment did a terrific job  I love the simplicity and comfort  Were it my place  I would take a paintbrush to the baseboard area of the bathroom  as well as to an area just above the towel rack where one can see the grime that the new paint must be covering  Also suggest you consider hanging two towel racks horizontally to the right of the kitchen sink  The WiFi did not work which caused me to use up virtually all of our data plan remaining over the next       weeks  I let them know the evening we arrived for our three night stay  it seemed that some clean gals came by late the next afternoon  but nothing was remedied  It would have been helpful to have had a phone number to reach a support person  I would have said they were excellent  but when we had a problem with wifi  it was inadequate

Beautifully decorated  with lots of natural light  comfy bedding and furniture  and well stocked bathroom and kitchen  The location was perfect for our needs  we were there for medical treatments at Siteman Center  just down the street   Loved being so close to Forest Park as well as to great eating spots in the CWE  The building maintains a firm masking policy in public spaces  which we appreciated  and the building felt very safe  Do note that if you are counting on having reliable high speed internet access for remote work or school  you will likely need to find somewhere else to work  The WiFi router itself works fine  though it doesnt extend the WiFi to the bedroom   but the internet service is weak  perhaps the service is being shared by every Zencity apartment in this building    We had to reset the modem multiple times a day to be able to use the internet on our laptops or to livestream on the TV  There are some WiFi lounges available on the main floor  including a private one  Even with the WiFi issues  we really loved our stay in this beautiful apartment  We loved this apartment   it is beautifully appointed  in a great location  and with super easy check in  Loved also that it included all the basic things guests would need   toiletries  clean supplies  toilet paper and paper towels  etc  The apartment was mostly clean but in the bathroom  there was a layer of dust and grime along the baseboards and flooring  Also  the flooring outside the bathroom needs to be secured   whoever laid it did not permanently secure it  and it slides  One other small repair need   the off on knob for the bedroom radiator doesnt seem to work  Finally  the WiFi needs to be upgraded or else not advertised  It was often nonfunctional  and when it did function it was slow  laggy  and kept dropping  We are techies and know how to do the typical troubleshooting like resetting the router and modem  checking our own devices  etc  We had to reset things multiple times a day and it still didnt keep the WiFi operating for long  Even with the WiFi issues  we really loved our stay in this beautiful apartment

Everything was great  The unit looked like it did in the pictures and there was so much space  The only issue we had was there was only one key card for building access and the card didn t work for the garage so we had to wait for the attendant to buzz us out every time we left Thank you  Your place allowed us the accommodations we needed while waiting on our unit to be completed  However there were   adults staying there and we worked different schedules so not having   key cards was a hassle

I loved the experience and it was very clean when I arrived  They answer all questions   have great parking for your leisure They where great and responded rapidly every time I had an issue  I would recommend them to anyone to book it was great

Check in could be kinda stressful if they don t have the keys for you ready when they say they ll be ready  And the layout of the building could be confusing but the security their are great and very helpful  The view was cool  Could see the power and light district and was in good location to many things  When you say your guests can check in anytime after    maybe just have what they need in order to check in at that time there   I was at the lock boxes to get the keys around      or so  enough after   o clock to think that it d be ready  And the keys weren t there yet and I had events to go to after  So I wasn t able to actually get into the building until almost    because thats when I was finally headed back from my event and I had to walk back not knowing if I was going to be stranded outside  Thankfully I was able to get in when another guest was using the doors which I understand is a security issue and the security guard was delightful and a major help  But I was worried being alone  at night  in a city I m not familiar with  not knowing if I was going to be able to access my own car which was in the parking garage attached to the building or get inside at all

By staying here  you run the risk of not being able to get into the room because you either do not receive check in instructions or the instructions you receive are incorrect  You also risk not having a safe place to park if the parking lot is full despite being promised a parking spot  We were told we would have one unassigned parking space  There were not enough parking spaces for all of the cars in the lot  We were instructed not to park on the street because we could get towed  We ended up parking in the parking lot in the driving lane  which was not a parking spot and put our car at risk of being hit by other cars  Someone else pulled into the parking lot after us and had to park in a handicap spot because there was no other option   The person was not handicapped  Door code provided didn t work  We had to stand around until someone left the building  which is not exactly safe to have people coming into the building though an open door I didn t realize this was a corporate run Airbnb  It was apparent once we arrived I had to ask for check in instructions  I didn t receive them until almost two hours after my check in time The price was listed reasonably but then with all the added fees  it was much more expensive than we had planned on paying

The pros  Location is very convenient  in the middle of the city with easy access to most tourist attractions  Building is modern with sleek and stylist d cor   Unit does have nice open layout feel with full kitchen  Neighboring units are quiet  Check in was relatively simple to access key to unit   The cons  Unit doesnt have the best view itself  you have a view of another brick apartment building and parking lot and garage  Parking pass was not provided as stated  management team communicated quickly that this would resolve issue and I would receive the parking pass the next day but this issue was never resolved so I ended up paying for parking myself through my stay  management team still has not resolved this issue one week after my stay ended   There was an off putting smell in the unit  this smell was not noticeable in the building  only the unit  I had to buy multiple air fresheners but it could not cover the smell  Im not sure of the source as the unit looked clean but it smelled like a toilet most of my stay    Overall  I give this stay   stars  I would recommend staying in a different unit if possible  Waiting to hear from management team to resolve not having parking pass during stay and having to pay for parking myself in the garage

I didnt mind the apartment so much it was a little bit ran down compared to what the pictures look like and the building was a little sketchy I mean the people in it but it was pretty nice experience except for the fact that they hadnt clean it I couldnt get a hold of any property manager to fix it and it wouldnt refund my money so I had to take all the bedding and everything and wash it myself it was ridiculous I was up here for a funeral You need to really check your property managers I had to do my own sheets I had to clean my own room I couldnt get a hold of nobody I couldnt find nobody to tell anything to neither could Airbnb  its ridiculous  The master key was laying on the counter in my room somebody been sleeping in the bed the bathroom was a mess and its covid season

this location is awesome  you are blocks away from a ton of things  the plaza  the nelson atkins museum is free   there s putt putt golf that costs but it was so worth it  the only hiccup we had with our stay was with check in  the access code they sent us was invalid but luckily there was a girl who lived there who called the building manager   released our keys  this place is very modern   the perfect amount of space for   people  the view was also cute    i recommend this place to anyone wanting to explore the area     minutes from everything    there are also electric scooters to navigate around  parking is a little difficult but manageable  this place is awesome  i would recommend leaving some salt pepper or some other necessities for cooking that don t go bad or salt   pepper packets

Great place and location

I ve stayed at this location a number of times and always enjoy it  The Bordeaux is low key  super stylish  and within walking short driving distance to a number of restaurants  coffee shops  and the Soulard Market  The price is simply unbeatable for the value  Will be back  Hi Zencity   This is my third time staying at one of your locations  twice in STL  once in Chicago  and I LOVE staying with you all  The Bordeaux is my little hone away from home  I literally live   mins away lol   Since I ve been working from home for over a year now  it s nice to have a little change of scenery  Looking forward to returning soon
Great place  Good communication  really good location  Highly recommend
It was perfect for an overnight stay

The apt is beautiful and located within walking distance to sights  restaurants  and the Arch  There is only one parking spot provided so if you have multiple cars  you will need metered parking  It is a very secure place  you need a key card to go anyway  but only one is provided so we needed to coordinate meeting up if my group split for the day  The apt has the bare minimum amenities provided  no coffee or condiments   There are sensors inside the apt that will alert Zencity if the noise is too loud  I received a text message from watching a movie too loudly   I think it is more sensitive after      pm   There was a hiccup of getting locked out and it took over an hour to resolve this  the door has a numeric code that somehow was deactivated   It took some time between messaging on the AirBnb app and sitting on hold when I called the host to finally have access back into the apt  I dont think I will select this host again just for the slow response time in a urgent situation  The customer service response needs to be quicker in the event of an urgent situation  We were locked out and I had to call twice even after messaging through the app  I think this warrants a call from you guys to fix this  Im not sure what happened with the code not working in the door  but I suspect someone forgot to update the code after we were granted the request to extend our reservation  When I called the provided number  it took a while for a response when it was rather urgent to get resolved  I was disconnected from a call and the agent didnt all me back  it took   mins of sitting on hold to finish the resolution  There is the bare minimum of amenities there

The instructions to enter weren t correct  which caused some confusion  Building address is different than listed and locked doors prohibited direct entry   Host said to go up the stairs after the building entrance  This lead to a locked door  which you could enter if you had the fob  It took some exploring to find the unlocked entrance  requiring backtracking   I informed the host  so this may be resolved already    Although the building smelled normal  the apartment itself faintly smelled of cigarette smoke for a few minutes upon returning each time  Maybe neighbors smoke   I had some air conditioning problems the first day  but no problems after contacting the host  Not sure what they did  though    The blinds weren t effective in keeping out the sun in the morning  making it difficult to sleep in past dawn    Great security and safety features  Great tv and kitchen  Great bedroom and bathroom  The instructions to enter the home weren t accurate  I informed the host  though  I also messaged about the air conditioning  and they responded but I didn t feel they followed up well enough  Fortunately  the problem was fixed  The street address says       not what is listed  Added security made it more difficult to enter the building  which wasn t included in the instructions  Business like responses  without seeking a full satisfactory experience  Problem solving instead of experience improving

Accurate description  The parking was a bit tricky at first  but once we figured it out it was a nice feature that isnt always included  thanks for the stay  The furniture needs a bit of help  couch is very wobbly  but it was a comfortable stay

Everything about this space was wonderful  The location was great  within ten minutes drive to everywhere I wanted to visit  The parking and security of the building were very safe  I would stay again easily

Perfect location  Bed and linens are super comfy  Very clean  I definitely plan on booking again in the near future  I love your place  The bed and linens were super comfy  The light is rather bright through the kitchen window  so some type of curtain to maybe block that lol

Very nice and clean  Close to aquarium and city museum  When checking in no one answered the intercom to let me in but someone inside the building let me in  Other than that everything else was amazing

Garbage place  garbage communication  Pictures are misleading  It s essentially a tenement apartment building with garbage all over it  someone had peed in the elevator  which was also covered in garbage   After our parking pass turned out to have no spot with the number on it and the landlord hadn t replied to and maybe hung up on several of our calls  we gave up and got a hotel elsewhere  I want a refund Area s gross  building s worse  We walked in  took one look  said this is gonna suck but we ll get through it  and then after our parking pass turned out to be to a nonexistent spot and the renter wouldn t respond  we got a hotel room in a better part of town  Again  front door broken open  no parking space with our number on it  no response to our calls  Very sketch  Lots of codes involved in the instructions but the door had been wrenched open and didn t require them  Lots of druggy looking folks coming and going  Elevator seemed to have been recently urinated in and was covered in trash  So disgusting I ate the hundred plus bucks they charged  ironically mostly in clean fees  and found a better place

This apartment is great   Very very clean   Quiet atmosphere   Beds are super comfortable  kitchen is large and location is perfect   short walk to our new favorite restaurant  True Food     Will definitely return and stay in this apartment  Initial entry at the door of the building did not work with putting in   digit code and then speaking   numbers   Had to keep pressing the  call  button until someone came to open the door

while the place was as expected based on photos  we were disappointed with several factors  first the smell  which I imagine is impossible to remove since the whole floor smells like a mixture of pot and attempts to cover the smell  The appt itself smelt a bit better than that but still not good  the whole first evening I was uneasy feeling like the place was dirty since there were several areas that were obviously unclean   Several of the lights throughout the place did not work  making night time a bit more difficult   the bed was pretty comfortable though and water pressure was nice  there were several amenities in the kitchen but was disappointed to find the water boiler was broken  stay was fine but I prob wont stay with zencity again we were disappointed with the cleanliness when we arrived  there were obvious dirty spots on the stove and table and on the floors    we also were incredibly disappointed to find that all the main lights in the apt did not work  first the main light in kitchen which made arriving in during early evening extra difficult and the light beside the sink in the bathroom  making it pretty impossible to see well in there

The check in instructions at the point where you enter the hillside g and use the intercom to obtain access to the proper floor simply does not work    We spent    minutes and three different calls to support  first wrap  Said they would call back since their connection  Was poor but never did call back  to get access to the floor      All this after paying extra   for early check in     Other than that the room was as  advertised and in a good spot    Easy walks to P L as well as Riverfront    Room was tidy and perfect for the two of us   Just plan on an extra  hour or two to check in if they do not update check in process  Check in process required calling three different times to get a person who could handle the issue   First person said they would call back in    minutes and never called back   Access to the proper floor via elevator did not work when following the instructions listed   Please update the process and or instructions to match   We wasted     hours once we got to the building before we could access the suite    This wasted more than     of the time we paid extra for early check in for    I feel ripped off on the early check in due to this issue

Great location  like a      minute drive to everything we wanted to do  plus some coffee shops  restaurants  and stores within walking distance  Has limited parking but we were able to find street parking easily over the weekend  The room had a bad smell  couldn t see anything that would have caused it though but it was a bit off putting  Great location and directions for check in and stuff were super clear and helped a ton  We had a great time

Overall a great stay and good value for the price  There is an automatic noise monitor and it is sensitive  Loud laughter triggered a warning message  Music needs to be in the background and kept fairly low to avoid the warning texts  Location is a few blocks from Power   Light and many things nearby close on the weekend so be prepared to walk a bit for amenities  Hello  overall our stay was great  I did want to mention that the glassware was not clean  smelled of bourbon  when we arrived and there were dirty smelly sponges under the sink  I think both the kitchen sink and one of the main bathroom sinks leak a bit

Beautiful apartment in a great part of town   Walking distance to so many nice restaurants and shops     Its also a terrific value    My only suggestion   complaint was the living room furniture is not very comfortable    Also  with a  two bedroom apartment   there was not enough glassware  cups  silverware  etc     All in all  we would ABSOLUTELY stay here again     Kansas City and Zencity far exceeded our expectations  Check in was very awkward   The code for the front door did not work and we had to rely on someone letting us in to get to our room    Once inside we were able to use our fob from that point forward

The location  and apartment itself were pretty nice  Parking was a breeze    Check in was an entire mess  I ve stayed at similar places where there are just a lot of steps and it s confusing  no  This wasn t confusing  the instructions were inaccurate  The steps to get into the building  fail  A nice person let us in the building  into the elevator and onto the floor  bc you need a key fob to do all that  which we didn t have   Get into the room  no key fob as promised in the directions  Getting one later was a HASSLE  This seems like an easily preventable situation  yet there are repeated reviews saying the same thing  This absolutely tainted my experience  The check in process was a mess  I followed the instructions and from the very beginning could not access the building  I couldn t get into the front doors  there was no key fob in the room  the lockbox by the door was unlabeled and also empty  so the backup plan didn t work   and then it took a few hours for it to be rectified  I was only able to get in and out of the building bc of the help of other nice people  This seriously would deter me from booking with you again
Clean  comfy  very enjoyable stay  Small issue buzzing in initially to get the elevator to work  Also internet was very slow   Mbps   Very clean  comfy  enjoyed everything else

Great room once inside  The check in process was horrible  We lucked out and met somebody who is staying on our floor that could let us in to the elevator and get us to our floor before getting our key   If we wouldn t have found them we would not have been able to get into the room  She also had a ZenCity Airbnb  She said it took her about two hours to check in  If they fix the check in process this would have been a five star review  We loved the room and the experience after the check in process  The directions to get into the room were unclear and also in accurate  The code we were given did not work  The only way we were able to successfully get into the room is because we happened to find somebody staying on the same floor as us since we needed a key fob to access the elevator  We got lucky bumping into another person staying there  If it wasn t for that person we would have never gotten to the room since there is no attendant in the lobby

Loved the location    right on the streetcar line  which is awesome  Plus  the apartment view was great and it was clean and comfortable  Also loved having access to the gym and convenient store  Overall a great place and would stay here again  Loved the location    right on the streetcar line  which is awesome  Plus  the apartment view was great and it was clean and comfortable  Also loved having access to the gym and convenient store  When we came home yesterday it did smell like smoke  which was strange  And when we arrived all the furniture was wet  I m assuming it was from being clean  but it was a little uncomfortable   Overall a great place and would stay here again

Great place in general  Sparkling clean  Nice beds and pillows  When we get back to Kansas City  we ll try to get this apartment again  Everything was great  only we have a little trouble getting the key

Check in  as other have stated  was not smooth at all  We did not have a fob and the intercom at the entrance did not work as it was explained   they did however respond within an hour attempting to provide a solution  we had already been let in by another guest   The place itself was clean and comfortable   I actually loved the space  I would stay again provided they updated corrected the building access  Thank you for the stay  The only thing that could be greatly improved is the check in process  The fob should be easy to find and access to the building should be quick and easy   the intercom was not effective at all

I think when I stayed  maybe the price was lowered because the nice pool area is under construction and closed  At the reduced price it was a great value   Comfy bed  full stocked kitchen  clean supplies  iron   everything I needed   I think they have a big team at Zen City so communication was a little off but with persistence I got in and had a great stay   If you don t have a car there are lots of buses and scooters to use  One broken couch leg  ceiling fan very dirty  French press missing a part so unusable  windows need clean   otherwise really a lovely stay thank you

Location is key when visiting a new city  This spot is within walking distance to a fabulous park and local eateries and grocery   By car only minutes from downtown  The host is very quick to respond with any questions or concerns  We would certainly stay again

This is a nice apartment building  It used to be a warehouse  The building renovation was completed in       I stayed in a two bedroom two bathroom unit  It have a nice modern look and very high ceilings  The neighborhood is nice and quiet  Youll receive check in instructions a few days before your stay  After you enter the unit number and access code on the keypad by the front door  youll have to walk up some stairs to get to the interior door on the first floor  Just a heads up  youll need someone to let you into the building so you can get to your assigned unit  Overall  I enjoyed my stay at Zencitys place  Overall  I like the apartment  Aside from being brand new  Its spacious  have a nice color scheme and looks very modern  As for the parking   I would suggest that the host either assign a spot to future customers or provide a short list of unassigned spots on the property for the customer to choose from by way of the check in instructions  Once I checked in  I messaged the host wanting to find out which spots on the property werent assigned to anyone  I didnt receive a response  Consequently  I chose not to park on the property because each spot is numbered and I didnt want to take any chances of parking in an assigned spot and risk my vehicle being towed

Very clean  spacious  centrally located downtown unit with in out dedicated parking spot   Within    minute walking distance to Bush Stadium  the Arch  City Musuem  and many breweries and restaurants   TV included streaming services and there were no issues with loud noises or smells  Detailed instructions were provided ahead of time  though a bit misleading   There was no  welcome packet   just the key card and fob  and no unit access code   Last thing I wanted after a day of travel was to reach the unit and not be able to enter   The host responded with the code    minutes after an initial message was sent   Phone call to the host was an automated system that hung up on me without connecting to a rep  Overall  responses were typically within an hour   The escalation phone number was useless  For the price  I would have liked a few more amenities    like a toaster and more storage shelving in the hall bathroom  In Out dedicated parking was a huge bonus

Improvements needed Dishes were dirty and tub needed to be refinished   whenever we showered we had paint chips on our feet Place wasn t clean   cleaners was just getting started at the time we supposed to check in and dishes still were dirty
Love this place  I slept so good  Thank you so much hopefully I can stay again
Great for value

It would have been ok if I would have had a place to park  if I had been able to enjoy music with my adult grandchildren  only   of them  and movies instead of getting messages about loudness when it was normal and when I arrived there was music blasting but when I entered my space I could barely hear it and that wasn t a problem  It just wasn t what I was use to  I meet them twice a year and this was my first at this place and I won t be returning  Couldn t enter upon arrival  No parking at night  Couldn t play tv loud enough to hear or music  I m in my   s hearing is not superb  Got a message to not park in handicap and I have handicap plates and a sticker

It was a very cute and stylish place  It was also super close to everything we wanted to go to and had a nice well lit enclosed parking lot that was nice There was something wrong with the tv everytime you clicked on a show to watch the colors were off
Great location  easy access to the building

These are clean  spacious apartments right in the middle of town   you couldn t ask for a better location  And while some of the fixtures were a little cheap and occasionally came out of the thin walls  watch the towel bars    the towels and linens were perfect  they brought us more soap when we needed it  the amenities were great  washer dryer in unit    Wow    and the views couldn t be beat  The parking garage was safe and so convenient  Thanks  This was a gorgeous apartment and it was located exactly where we needed   and ultimately we were well cared for  There were some bumps  but in general our memories are happy ones  The host didn t include the right info for our electronic lock  plus the parking spot we were assigned was mysteriously filled by another car halfway through our stay  We were not given all the codes we needed to unlock the front door  it delayed us getting into the apartment by about a half hour  at the end of a long travel day  On some topics our host was  very  responsive   replacing broken appliances  and someone did get back to us within the hour when we were missing the code to get into the apartment at check in  But there were other times we had questions and we just didn t hear from anyone at all

This is a great apartment in an amazing location right in the heart of downtown    We woke up  grabbed coffee a few doors down  and took an invigorating little walk down to the arch before starting our day     The apartment is just as it appears in photos  Kinda minimalist  kinda modern  kinda urban  plenty spacious      bathrooms and laundry is very convenient  as is a fully stocked kitchen    The beds are super comfortable   The apartment is somewhat loud and drafty  The draftiness was not an issue for us although I can see how it might be during cooler temperatures   The street noise wasnt an issue either   though I expected it to be I actually slept amazingly well    As others have mentioned  we did experience flushing issues and would have appreciated a more thorough clean  towels  bedding  and hard surfaces were all very clean  living room furniture needs a good clean    Our stay was positive overall  Id gladly stay again  but I do hope the mentioned issues are able to be addressed  Thank you so much for hosting us   We loved the unit  the location  the beds  the temperature was comfortable at the time we were there  we appreciated having a stocked kitchen as we ate in    We did have toilet flushing issues  the smoke alarm was chirping the entire time which was very annoying  and  as others have mentioned  we would have preferred it to be cleaner     For me  living room furniture that can be wiped down would make a huge difference in this unit   Thank you again for hosting us  despite the issues mentioned  we had a good stay
Very good for the price  pretty good location  without walking distance of a bunch of different restaurants   attractions  Had trouble getting back into room due to passcode not working
Great place

This apartment was clean  convenient to many areas of St  Louis  had comfortable beds and was very secure   The only thing Id say is that if you are a light sleeper  the sirens might be an issue due to the proximity to Barnes Jewish Hospital   There are white noise machines and window A C units that can help block some of the noise   Parking wasnt horrible   We parked on the street and had to pay the meter between the hours of  AM and   PM   Its free on Sundays   We were not in the apartment much  but it had everything we needed for showers and sleeping   I would stay here again

Strong discourage anyone from renting this unit  The unit stinks of stale cigarettes and marijuana smoke  Nothing felt clean  The walls are paper thin and the neighbors party and fight constantly  There was a dog that wouldn t stop barking  The door lock is improperly installed  The floor sounded like you were walking on a sound generator from a horror flick  The bathroom looked like it was designed for hospice and the toilet seat was broken  We tried cancelling our stay the moment we walked in  fully prepared to drive the   hours back home we had just driven  but Airbnb could not reach the host  We left the next day and cancelled the rest of our   day holiday  No one should ever rent this unit again  Entire unit felt  grimey   Smoke smell was on everything in the unit  Unit is neighbored by awful neighbors

Great location next to Barnes Jewish Hospital   Short walk to some neat restaurants and bars and quick drive anywhere you would want to go   I    about   blocks away   Couldnt ask for a better spot location   Check in easy     need key fob for elevator   We did not get one but not a real issue as there is a doorman until midnight so they can access the elevator for you   All of them were very hospitable   Room was just that   room w bed and TV on the wall  bathroom w tub and a skinny kitchen   studio or hotel room   which works for my wife and I     Pictures do the space good justice  neutral grays and whites   very comfortable bed     would stay here again no parking   garage cost     for the night

The place was comfortable and mostly clean  a couple of corners and harder to reach spots had accumulated some grime  the parking structure is a couple blocks away and I got soaked in the rain walking back to the building but other than that it was perfect
Very good  Take advantage of the rooftop Very good  Instructions on getting in could be better

Spacious Elevator non working  locking the door impossible  The humidity made the trash shoot outside the unit stink terribly and could smell inside unit  There was a short in one of the lamps so it was like a strobe light while on  The microwave function was not right  the table turned but didn t get hot   Obviously these were not deal breakers but wanted someone to be aware of the punch list
Love it   A favorite   Thanks Zencity for your hospitality  Lovely place would stay again   Limited supplies in kitchen but not everyone stays in for dinners   Definitely a recommended stay

This unit is in a great location downtown  and in a very secure apartment building  However  I was somewhat disappointed with how many cleanliness issues I found  especially considering how small the place is  I noted the specific issues with the host  I did also have issues with check in  as some of the codes provided did not work  The host usually responded to my messages and questions in a timely manner  which I appreciated  The place was fine for what I needed  but sadly I m not sure I would stay here again due to the issues I had  I was a little disappointed by the amount of cleanliness issues that I found  for it being such a small space  I just wanted to note those things so you are aware for the future  Perhaps there s just an issue with the clean service utilized    Several utensils and dishes that I pulled out of the cabinet drawers were clearly not clean   The fridge and freezer had a strong odor to them   There was a couple pieces of trash left in the bathroom trash can    The electric kettle was dirty  and contained a sour smelling dark liquid in it    It looked like all the clean towels were folded and sitting on the bed when I got there  However  I found one on its own still hanging on the bathroom door  which makes me think it was a dirty one that was missed  Perhaps I m wrong  I also had several issues checking in  as some of the codes did not work  Again  I appreciate that you all responded to every message in a timely manner  My main issue was the cleanliness
Nice spot  KC is awesome

This location is in a good spot  My issue with it was the entry process wasn t smooth  I had to wait until someone was exiting and I had to ask someone to grant me access to use the elevator  for entering the first time and the room s floor was pretty dirty  Please make sure the intercom system works  I had to wait until someone tell me in the building and they had to swipe me into the elevator    The room s floor was dirty and needed to be clean

Great little apartment  Close to the deck where parties happen do it could be noisy for you  All the guests were friendly   the party did not go late  I love staying here  I love the places in the Wonder Building  This one looked very clean but the floors were very dirty  I played on the floor with my grandkids and wish I had known to mop them first  All in all I loved my stay
So close to downtown  Great place for a girls weekend  Such a fun place to stay  Will be back for sure   Great spot for a girl weekend

Cons  Older building which has people living in the units  so management does not like people staying there through AirBnb  No direct communication through ZenCity before arriving  Questions were not answered  The check in process given was faulty and incorrect   A security guard had to let us in after some time of waiting in the vestibule  No toaster or kitchen towels  Few eating utensils  Horrible smell permeated the unit and building because on ongoing construction in adjacent building    Pros   Older building    was a hotel with Art Deco style  which was very cool  Bed and pillows were comfortable Towels were fluffy and soft  Would not recommend Hello   I am requesting that half of our stay be reimbursed  Please respond that you have received this message  From the very start  I had no direct communication with Zencity about the rental  I had asked questions through the app after booking before arriving that were never answered  The only responses were about check in and rules  My questions were never answered  The check in procedures were not correct and we were stuck in the vestibule with no way to enter the building or the unit  I tried calling but no one answered  We were about ready to spend the night on the ground in the vestibule   it was after midnight when checking in as our flights had been delayed   and we were rescued by a security guard who happened to be walking by and was able to allow us access  Once we got in and were able to use the key card  all seemed fine  You do need to know that the directions in using the keypad DO NOT WORK    The security guard even told us that the keypad is faulty  Even he tried the keypad and it would not work with the sent directions   On the day before check out  a strange and horrible smell started to enter the unit  It smelled like nail polish remover times     It started to burn our nose and throats  The hall did not smell  but the lobby and and elevators did  Our next door neighbor  who lives in the building  was also experiencing this smell  We were told that there was construction going on in the connected building and that the smell would dissipate  I called ZenCity and spoke to Karen  who seemed to want to help but didnt seem to really know what to do except call her manager supervisor  She never followed up with me about these calls  even though she said she would  We left the unit for several hours hoping it would be better when we returned for the last night in the unit  When we got back  the smell was even worse and the lobby seemed filled with a haze  It was intolerable  There was no way we could sleep in such a situation  I called ZenCity again  asked to speak to Karen  who had left and the person on the phone was able to offer money back for one night   We are still waiting to see if this happens  I have had refunds from AirBnb before  and they are very quick  if not instant  I was told      days  which seems suspect given my experience at other times  We had the inconvenience of needing to find a hotel for one night  which was more expensive and very inconvenient as we had to pack up  move locations  and unpack for only one night  At added expense  which was not counted upon for this trip  This inconvenience needs to be compensated  I am requesting that half of our stay be reimbursed  Please respond that you have received this message

Please be careful about booking your stay at this place  The listing states that there is a rooftop but that is a complete lie  My friends and I booked this place in order to have an outdoor space to enjoy and meet friends that are nervous about being in doors with COVID and we felt very let down by this listing  Prior to the booking we contacted the host company and I was told there was a roof top area for the building  Upon arrival and further communication with the host we were informed that this information was not true  Also the way in which the guest acquires the keys to the unit is very confusing and takes time to figure out  It is not user friendly at all  AirnBnB management will be notified about your false advertising
Amazing place to stay my sister and I had a great time and will always look forward to coming back here
Great location and super stylish space  we loved it

The place is perfect location   beautiful building  beautiful view  The inside was very clean  the beds were comfortable  it was stocked with plenty of towels and pillows and all the extras including laundry soap  I would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again  The place is perfect location   beautiful building  beautiful view  The inside was very clean  the beds were comfortable  it was stocked with plenty of towels and pillows and all the extras including laundry soap  I would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again  I had multiple emails stating to return the key fab to the front desk then after we had checked out we were asked to leave it in the room  Not a big deal and they did respond very quickly to emails

I found parking behind the building for a great price and only a minute  or two walk from the apartment  Entry in was very easy with the directions given  The place was absolutely beautiful  Close to anything youd want  Loved it  It was the perfect location for my stay and I loved the apartment   Hopefully its available on my next trip to STL

Our code would not work when we arrived  I called and the situation was fixed immediately  We were also able to check in earlier  The carpet in the bedroom had stains by the bedside and could use deep clean  I had to go buy spoons as there were only   so every meal we got done eating  I had to wash spoons  When we got there  every window was unlocked and cracked open  We started to shut them all  The window in the smaller bedroom would not close enough to lock so it was a little unsettling to sleep with an unsecured window  The beds were absolutely wonderful to sleep in  I would stay again  given the carpets and window were updated  The carpet needs deep clean or replaced  Very disgusting in the smaller bedroom

Very quiet and chic room close to the park and WHOLE FOODS  Also  in a great area to take walks  Definitely recommend for couples or someone needing to get away  Thank you for the great hospitality  Always enjoy staying with ZenCity Hair throughout the bathroom
Great location  near great coffee shop and brunch places  awesome place  spacious  and  modern  would definitely return

This space great  Especially if you are attending an event at the Enterprise Center  Clean space and easy check in and out  Fast response from host as well  I feel it is a great value for the money and great location  I can highly recommend  I loved the apartment  I was close to Enterprise Center and clean  Easy check in and out  Only suggestion I have is hot water takes a long time and add a coffee pot  Other than that we will be back when we visit St Louis again    stars for me
Great location  Great location  We had to wash all the dishes again before we used them  We also found the magazine to a firearm in one of the kitchen cabinets

This is an affordable apt building  there were trash bags and trash in front of the apt door  Also the apt has a strong cigar smell  Loud neighbors  I ended up not staying there  host didnt give me full refund  in times of Covid this building is not prepared for health safety  this is an affordable complex for elderly people it was difficult to find and the code plus speaking didnt work the common areas had trash bags and trash in front of the apt door  it is too expensive for the type of building

Stayed in this cute and modern Airbnb for a night and loved the overall vibe of the apartment  The apartment was somewhat confusing to get into but other than that I really enjoyed staying here  Was a wonderful and cute apartment but struggled with getting into the building especially when we were not given a key fob we also were awaken early by barking dogs so maybe mention in further listings that the building is pet friendly  Loved staying here other than that
Great spot

The place was clean but had some minor broken things but nothing major  The place also had a cigarette smell when the rules say no smoking  Other then that the place was very clean and was exactly how pictures are  Also the balcony door didn t lock and no shade over door  Enjoyed our stay and would recommend  Went to check in and put the code in the lockbox but the code wasn t working had to call the host  He gave me a few different codes and then finally he told me a way easier to get in the apartment

Nice space and a perfect location  We would stay here again as you can walk to so many nice restaurants and stroll in the park   We did have trouble getting into the apartment with their battery operated key pad but ZenCity  was quick to respond and got us in without a problem  Bring your own shampoo  cream rinse and soap as only a hand soap is provided  There are no extras in the kitchen bring your own food and essentials  there are plenty of pots and pans  The shower faucet is out of reach so you have to be in the shower stall to turn the water on  But overall a great experience  parking on site was easy and convenient  We re so enjoyed the space and especially the location   I would replace the door lock with a lock box key  much more reliable  A few more amenities in the kitchen would help  we would have liked a spatula  Shampoo  cream rinse and soap for the shower would help though we did have our own  Overall good  it fit our needs perfectly  We had trouble with the battery operated for entry  the host walked us through a procedure to override it

Arrived and followed instructions for check in  but the apartment FOB was not in the apartment  This is a problem because without the FOB you cannot use the private parking  you can only enter and exit the apartment building from the front door by entering a code  and you can only enter the apartment by using a different and much longer code  Having a small child with us made all of this much more inconvenient  Plus  who knows where the FOB was  It didnt make me feel confident in our security that the last users may be walking around the city with the FOB to our rental   Communication about the missing FOB was extremely poor  First message went unanswered  after a second message hours later  we were told the FOB would be delivered  as soon as possible   That was the last we heard about the FOB  we checked out five days later without ever receiving it  or ever receiving an update   The whole thing was a pretty bad experience  and I would never book from this group again

Run away from Zencity    This management company is a joke  The apartment required use of a call box in the foyer to gain access to the building  It was broken  so entry was impossible  They suggested having a resident let us in  that works great if you can find one  and whos going to do that at      in the morning after an evening out  They made zero effort to fix the issue throughout the weekend and we ended up on the floor of my daughters tiny apartment  They were very slow to refund a partial amount  then sent a checkout message with an attached bill for an additional       Airbnb has done very little to advocate for my wife and I throughout this mess  Very disappointed as a consumer and shareholder  Sell sell sell     This is a disaster  The call box that is required tho gain entrance to the building does not work  I used the Airbnb chat function without reply  so I called the commercial number  Fortunately  after being on hold for a bit  Francis  picked up  His suggestion was to find a resident of the building to let us in and that they have been having issues with this call box for several weeks  Yet no one tried to communicate that beforehand  It was a complete disaster  We had to sleep in the floor of my kids tiny apartment  No effort was made to correct the issue throughout the weekend  Then the icing on the cake is that I got an email saying it was time to check out and there was another      charge   I NEVER SET FOOT IN THE APARTMENT         Your  service  is terrible  thank you for the stiff neck from sleeping on the floor

Let me start by saing checking in was a nightmare  It took us literally two hours to find a key they  placed  in a keybox  in the end there was no key in the key box  So they asked us to go to the room and check if ths door was open  we went up to the room and the door was open  the room was not clean there was trash all over the place  bedroom was a mess as well  so they told us all they could do for this ome night is relocate us to another building  so they relocated us to another building  We HAD TO WALK through kc to another location not only that they seemed to give me attitude about the fact that they had to relocate me and on top of that the relocation was only for that one night since i was going to return to the original room I booked once they actually clean it  The next day when i return to the room i dealt with the same issues again  and it was about half an hour until i was able to retrieve a key from this ridiculous key box  when we finally made it up to the rolm realize the door was not even capable of locking I sent them a message and they never got back to me about it  so I spent the whole trip taking my bags with me in and out so that i was sure they were not stolen  they also never got back to me about the door never locking  literally was ths worst booking experiance of my life  I highly do not recommend  on top of that small things like Old dirty dishes  no air filter on the ac that bothered me quite a bit  Never use zen city  thank you for communicating me the first night but I felt I could not trust you after I told you the door cannot even lock and you guys never contacted me back about it

Thank you for the use of your apartment   The location was great   Thank you I would have given   stars if the things in my private emails to you didn t happen and my safety concerns were met   Thank you

The apartment was clean and as described  A nice sized suite for my girlfriend and Id stay  Checking in would have been impossible if not for other guests helping us after their own difficulties  If intending to check in when other folks arent coming and going you may want to skip this stay  Otherwise it was quiet  close to the Power and Light District  and the shower head was excellent  If they fix the intercom or improve check in procedures I would stay again  Have to get that intercom fixed  luckily other guests helped us get in  and we were kind enough to pay it forward

A beautiful place  and great location  Our only negative thing to say was check in instructions were not fully accurate and took some help from the apartment complex staff  otherwise great host  great place  it was a beautiful place  one star off because the check in instruction didnt work and were confusing  we couldnt get in through the front door callbox  and neither could other people who had airbnbs  not sure if they were through you as well  and then out instructions said to find the elevator on the right but it was down the hallway on the left and we didnt even need to take it  we were on the first floor  otherwise a great stay  just confusing to get into the complex

Great location and lovely apartment  Little troubles checking in with intercom but Zencity was quick to respond and I was able to get in quickly  Intercom was down but the gentleman from Zencity was very helpful and we figured it out

I would be cautious to stay here  I arrived and never received the appropriate key card to enter the building and the gym  I was able to get a code for the exterior door  but was never able to access the amenities  even after communicating this issue to the renter several times on multiple days  The apartment had not successfully been clean and was dusty with dead flies in the window sills and the floor dirty  The toilet did not work appropriately and was never fixed during my stay   I had to go to the lobby to use the bathroom  There was also no hot water for the shower  which was also never fixed  I communicated all of this to the renter via Airbnb messaging and phone calls multiple times and they never fixed any of the issues  When you make commitments to communicate with guests  please keep them  You told me you would communicate to me what my refund would be  then never responded

This was a cool modern apartment with concrete floors that I didn t expect but that my kids loved  There were great views of the downtown area and overall it was a great stay  My kids enjoyed the amenities  rock wall  basketball  video arcade machine and ping ping table   Unfortunately the equipment needed for some of the amenities wasn t readily available and only able to be checked out at certain hours  Thank you for the info and helping on check in and out procedures  We had a great stay  There are a few things I would like to bring to your attention however    The apartment was not swept vacuumed when we arrived  Also some of the dishes were unclean and had food residue in them  The wi fi signal was not very strong and so there were a lot of interruptions while trying to stream shows
