We stayed over the Thanksgiving holiday at a Zencity apartment in the historic Del Prado  a beautiful  Art Deco building that still has some apartments  in a different area of the building  that are home to its pre gentrification tenants  they are geriatric and many are in wheelchairs or use walkers  The location is excellent  very close to Hyde Park s restaurants and shops  a walk  during the daytime  to Whole Foods  Trader Joe s  etc  The apartment was spotlessly clean  cozy  and warm  with beautiful views  We found street parking during our entire stay  The one glitch was the bathroom  The shower head fell off each time  and when using the shower the water pressure wasn t great  Also  a grab bar near the high walled tub is very much needed  I ve alerted Zencity about this  and am hopeful they will fix these concerns  There is a severe shortage of hotels and Airbnb s in Hyde Park  and if you need to be near the U of Chicago  this is an excellent place to stay  A few notes  in order of importance  for Room     of the Del Prado  Bathroom was a big problem  The shower head is not secure  falls off each time  and the water pressure when using the shower is weak  Next  and more seriously  you must put in grab bars near the tub   it is downright dangerous to get out of the tub  which has high walls  The tub floor is slippery and there is no place to grab onto when getting out  The drain needs clean  the tub filled up  even when the stopper is not closed  during our showers     Please put more hangers into the closets  needed for longer term stays  we were their four nights    Although the desk staff was by and large friendly  when we checked in the person at the desk seemed confused by  Zencity  and I had to explain we were staying in an apartment that was an Airbnb    The video streaming system was confusing but we figured it out and by and large it worked  Detailed instructions would be helpful   Otherwise  the apartment was lovely  warm  beautiful views  spacious and cozy   I will recommend in my public post  as there is a critical shortage of hotel space and Airbnb s in the University of Chicago area  Please fix the bathroom and you have a goldmine

The ac never worked they never came out to fix it or clean up the room it was a horrible experience When we got there bed was not made up clothes in washer it needed a full detail just sad the way they treat you after you spend your money

This was a great find in a quiet St Louis neighborhood  Perfect for our small family of three  We loved having the full kitchen and a washer and dryer  Bed was super comfy  too  Close to downtown and easy to get in and out of  Street parking was accessible and the hallways were quiet  Pool area was nice but a little more busy and rambunctious than we imagined  There was what looked like a huge college party the Saturday during our stay  We managed but it was a little surprising  No noise complaints from inside the apartment  There was a small mishap with our door s keypad since we extended our stay a few extra hours on the last day  I called the owners and someone was able to fix it remotely so we could get back into the apartment  They were always quick to respond and very accommodating  I would totally book here again  Thank you so much for such a lovely place to stay at  It was a perfect size for our family and had all the amenities that we needed  One suggestion I d have is to check the silverware in the kitchen and make sure they re properly clean  There were several pieces that were pretty dirty  especially the steak knives which had a lot of food still on them

Especially wonderful establishment nice clean at Friendly what to do nearby I recommend to all I would like to thank you for your hospitality I had a great experience only one complaint and it wasnt on you it was good neighbors upstairs the kids are running around till like   in the morning

Great place to stay in St Louis  Right across the street from the park and just down the block from a Whole Foods and a bunch of restaurants   Apartment is anything super fancy  but has everything you need and is clean and comfortable  Would happily stay there again  Thanks for a great stay

Excellent room with a great view of Hyde Park   Very clean and comfortable   The lobby of the Prado is a bit tired and the elevators were broken down for about a half day  but it was all good   Desk clerk was very friendly and helpful   There was a bit of check in confusion but the desk clerk worked it all out and I was happy    The neighborhood is wonderfully diverse and I felt very safe as I walked around   The Prado is near   the waterfront  many parks  the Museum of Science and Industry  and the University of Chicago   There are a lot of good restaurants and stores like Whole Foods and Trader Joes are within walking distance   All in all  I give this room two thumbs up  Check in was a bit difficult  My wife made the reservation so they were expecting her to check in and would not let me check in until they confirmed it was okay with Zencity   The desk clerk had a some problems getting a hold of the correct person at Zencity    the first person she talked to could not help her and the second one kept on dropping the call   Thanks to her tenacity  she finally got through and got permission to give me the key to the room   That was a relief   I was not in the mood to chase down another room in Hyde Park   So  kudos to the desk clerk for working so hard and bad marks for Zencity for making it so difficult for her
such a great stay
We stayed here while traveling for work and it was a great location  It was a peaceful and spacious suite  with a great view  I loved the rain shower   Thank you again    Everything was wonderful

Nice space for a quick visit  Location wasn t terrible and the space was clean  I love that the kitchen has the right supplies to make a variety of meals  The only issue was parking could be a challenging  I would definitely stay here again

The apartment is really well appointed  quiet  comfortable and a great location  However  the key fob that was meant to be in the apartment was missing  which meant I had to rely on the front desk staff of the building  who are all lovely  to let me in the front door  the elevator and the gym  It was really inconvenient because I needed to come and go quite a lot  The host was responsive and promised to get a spare to me several times but it never materialized
Everything was great  thank you
Easy  convenient  great location  modern feel

Im a frequent Airbnb traveler and this time booked the place for two weeks for my business trip  I found the Zancity apartment not suitable for my needs  there is no working table and a comfy chair  in the picture you can see a tiny table and a plastic chair   so I mostly worked standing placing my laptop on the microwave in the kitchen  There is a lack of drawers or other surfaces especially in the bedroom and bathrooms and I kept my stuff in the suitcase  The handers were missing so Zenticy stuff brought us some  We also got only one key even though we were two people with different schedules and were told that there is only one  Last but not least the apartment wasnt clean as we used according to the Airbnb standards   having some dust  stains  and peeling all around  Zencity sent a clean person but the place requires deep clean of the kitchen and maintenance in the bathrooms  I wont recommend this place as its also not so cheap  Please clean the apartment for the next guests  especially the kitchen and bathrooms   We highly recommend adding a working station   a table and comfy chairs for   people  Everyone works remotely today  Also adding some drawers would be great  I would go to Goodwill and buy some pictures and items to make the place cozy and reduce the feeling of a ghost apartment
I had a great stay here and would definitely come back again Thanks i really enjoyed my stay loved the place btw

Great place to stay  great area  Looks just like the pictures clean environment  Only negative was I wasn t left the key so I couldn t go to the rooftop and could not park in the designating parking  but zencity did answer back and tried to fix the problem  Other then that everything was perfect I ll definitely book with them again

This unit is NOT market ready  It needs a major deep clean  the unit was filthy when I arrived  The blind doesnt work and the outdoor furniture is in terr vel condition  Customer service from Zenicity terrible  renter beware  Your clean standards are below grade  Terrible maintenance of the unit  it was filthy

Fantastically situated apartment in cool repurposed building offering great space  form and function for a professional of leisure stay in KC  Check in process wasnt great   telecom system appeared to be a know fault and your backup fob in mail box   didnt work  there was no fob  save for tail gating I would have not have gotten access   there is a pretty strong sewage smell in the apartment which I figure is just a function of the older building plumbing but wasnt a great vibe when going to bed   There was some heavy marks on the stove top and some general wear and tear type stuff around the apartment   Otherwise a great stay  great spot and great value

Great location and more spacious than the pictures indicate  The multiple floors and master bed bath are great  Would recommend staying  but as others have indicated  keep in mind WiFi was not great unless you are next to the router  streaming on the TV in the living room was choppy and no internet upstairs  Had issues with the door lock at check in and it required fixing new batteries halfway through the stay

if you want a Zen place thats got a city feel with out the traffic in Kansas city  This is the place for you this place was amazing      loved the hallway and the location thank you so much for letting me stay

Not suitable for a long term stay because the more time you spend at the property the more issues arise    In most cities downtown is the hub for greatness  not the case for STL  Close to lots of nightlife  only one grocery store across the street that is limited in what it carries  The building is close to the metro but I don t recommend taking it unless you want to encounter questionable smells and sketchy characters    Out my three months at the apartments the elevator broke at least three times a month I stayed on the seventh floor and was not given the code to the back alley stairway until after I had to hunt zen city down through Airbnb and wait almost an hour for a response  If you re handicap or have trouble with stairs I wouldn t even risk booking a stay here    The entry to the apartment almost pick and chose when it would accept the code  Sometimes it wouldn t register the number until after the  rd try  and other times you would have to jiggle the handle to reset the system and then enter the code    The apartment looks like the pictures but it does not show the cracked paint  holes in window linings  the slow drains  and the weak water pressure    This unit is suitable for a very short term stay if it s the only option but I do not recommend it for travelers in need of extended accommodations  Update the apartment  address the weak water pressure  change the batteries in the tv remote because since check in it s been low  actually communicate about maintenance issues in the apartment so you re guests aren t caught off guard
yes yes
Good location  good space  Not the cleanest but was good for a   day stay while working in Chicago
It was nice and comfortable Thanks

Great location  beautiful space Thank you so much for being a great host
Exactly as described  Perfect for what I wanted at the time

The lock to the room was broken when I tried to check in  and the door was wide open when I first got there  It was unsafe for me to stay so I wasted      on this Air BnB and had to get a hotel room downtown so I could have a place to stay where I wouldn t have to worry about someone breaking in
Nice place as always

several of the ights were burned out  wich left the lighting to be desired   the stove and sink were not clean   my guest had his truck stolen just outside the west side of the building  across from the federal reserve bank durring the day sometime between  am when i returned from work   and      ish when we checked out
Nice stay nice location everything was perfect Nice Stay Beautiful Place

We really enjoyed the space   You are close to a blue line station which is super helpful  uber lyft is not much of an option in the city    The place is clean  tidy and well taken care of  One takeaway we had was that the listing said that shampoo  body soap and conditioner would be provided  but there wasnt anything in the space   This isnt a huge deal  but we did have to go shopping after a long day of travel to be able to take a shower   Overall we really enjoyed it and would recommend   I just would have packed travel soap Thank you so much for the stay   We really enjoyed the space   One takeaway we had was that the listing said that shampoo  body soap and conditioner would be provided  but there wasnt anything in the space   This isnt a huge deal  but we did have to go shopping after a long day of travel to be able to take a shower    Also the backdoor was difficult to open  so we just left it alone

By far the worst Airbnb experience we ve had  all because of management  There were a plethora of shortcomings with the apartment during our   week stay  but the worst was when our thermostat stopped working and the heat turned off when it was    degrees outside  After multiple attempts to work with Zencity to rectify the situation  days of them lying and telling me that maintenance was  on their way    someone finally came on day    only after I contacted Airbnb directly  We literally had to turn on the oven to heat the unit in the middle of winter  I travel for work and use Airbnb monthly  and have never been so frustrated than I was staying here  Do yourself a favor and keep scrolling
Great quite area   Easy free street parking    Kitchen could have been a little more clean

Overall  we enjoyed our stay  I m a Chicago native and I graduated from Kenwood  so I m familiar with the area  The location is amazing  However  we knew that cleanliness could be an issue  and it was  We knew that parking  could be an issue  and it was  The washer and dryer aren t in the unit and you ll need to navigate staying in an older building  If you choose to stay at this apartment  adjust your standards  I appreciated the quick response to our check in issues  The location is amazing as we were able to visit our family and the Museum of Science and Industry  However  the apartment could have been cleaner  It wasn t swept or vacuumed  one of the windows was open  one of the beds did not have a fitted sheet  and the fridge had an odor  Considering the amount we paid  which included a clean fee  we should not have had to sweep the apartment  We shouldn t have to navigate stains in the area rugs  We shouldn t have to hold our breath when opening the fridge  Our stay should ve been no fuss  especially considering the rules that are listed for the apartment and the cost
Great apartment   Good location and very clean Thank you so much for the stay  Great place

Great location    short blocks from the Plaza  and the pool was a fantastic way to spend a Friday afternoon  Most tenants seem to be in their late   s and   s so the atmosphere was extremely chill and friendly  Staff was very helpful and courteous  The amenities are excellent and the apartment itself is sleek and clean  That bed was DIVINE and the place was quiet which made for some great sleep  Will stay here again in a heartbeat  We loved it here  Our only issue was with checkin  The keypad intercom at the main building entrance simply wouldnt work for us so we had to call the front office  They came out to troubleshoot it but it wouldnt work for them either  Luckily they just let us in so we could go upstairs and grab the key fob so we wouldnt have to fuss with it again  Minor hiccup but everything else was delightful  Next time we have a Kansas City getaway  I will look for this rental first  We would stay again in a heartbeat

Very spacious apartment and really attractive space with really comfortable beds  The price was affordable for the location  Some of the decor was a little sloppily done  paint splatters tile in main bathroom floor was broken and the door would not close  There were grubby fingerprints on the tv and the apartment appeared clean but had a slight stale cigarette smell  We had some difficulty checking in  when we entered the key code the door would not open  After repeated tries we called the rental agency and were told we needed to pull the door toward us  So we had a frustrating    minute or so delay getting in to the apartment  It would have been helpful if this tip were included in the checking info  A great neighborhood and an otherwise nice  very comfortable space somewhat marred by a little shabbiness and dinge  This could easily be remedied by better clean  which is warranted given the steep clean fee  We had a difficult time checking in bc the door would not open  we called for help and had to wait about    minutes to be told to pull the door toward us when opening  I would suggest including this in the instructions

Good place  very modern   clean  great views  quiete  Nice A C good water pressure  SUPER COMFORTABLE beds  Overall everything was superb  There was small things that needed fixed like one or two bulbs were not functional and a couple hinges were loose in cabinets but it wasn t a major issue for me  Also I think the garage  had issues with access because the card didn t work to get me access but luckily the help button granted me free access to get in and out of private garage  Good place overall  some things needed updates  Some light bulbs did not work some hinges were broken at the kitchen cabinets  Besides the little small things there was one issue that was somewhat major  and that was parking  I m not sure if it was the card for unit     but it seemed as if it didn t have access to the indoor garage so luckily the help button on site granted me access to enter and leave every time I left the garage  Otherwise the parking bill would have been very expensive

Larger place than you might expect and the bedroom is DARK and relaxing  Walkable to cool restaurants  Real beautiful and quiet park of town  Great  functional kitchen    Remember you re dealing with a company  It s fine enough but the service isn t personal or particularly accommodating  The deal you sign will be the deal you get  If someone wants to extend  make it happen  Don t turn around and rent their place out
Great stay
Great place to stay

We especially appreciated the location of this Airbnb in Hyde Park  including its close access to parks  shoreline  sandwich shops and cafes  Although the room showed some of the aging associated with the historic building  we had everything we needed  including good internet connections  air conditioning  comfortable beds  clean bathrooms  and fully applianced kitchen  Thanks  We especially appreciated the location of this Airbnb in Hyde Park  including its close access to parks  shoreline  sandwich shops and cafes  Although the room showed some of the aging associated with the historic building  we had everything we needed  including good internet connections  air conditioning  comfortable beds  clean bathrooms  and fully applianced kitchen

Departamento est  bien ubicado y es lindo  pero  el anfitri n deber  mejorar la limpieza y el equipamiento del mismo  Nuestra estad a podr a haber sido mucho m s placentera si el departamento hubiese estado limpio y mejor equipado   Las camas son comodas y sabanas y toallas adecuadas  Falta aire acondicionado en el segundo dormitorio que tiene un ventilador chico que no refresca el ambiente  Fue casi imposible dormir all  ya q recibe todo el sol de tarde  La cocina estaba muy mal equipada  con vajilla rota y poca  No hay bols  para hacer una ensalada  ni rayador de zanahoria ni colador para mencionar algunas deficiencias  No hab a ni un salero en la cocina  La tarjeta para el lavarropas est  desactualizado y no sirve  Solo funcionan con tarjeta de cr dito  Es una lastima que el anfitri n no se muestre m s servicial ya que el Depto es lindo y bien ubicado

Great location  lovely apartment and truly brilliant building amenities  pool  gym  grills  roof lounge etc  perfect for a summer stay in Chicago  Hi  We loved the stay and think if anything youve undersold it in your ad  The building amenities and location are so great you could definitely feature them more     We had a lovely stay but a couple of things that would make it simply perfect  Spoons  tea   normal    baking tray  hangers or drawers for clothes storage  The cutlery drawer was also off its runner  I think your team knows but its quite heavy so definitely worth fixing before it falls on someone

Very nice Airbnb clean just makes sure there is nothing loud because I got a noise complaint over a fan  Can you please buy a fan for any next guest cause it was really hot in there that s why I got the noise complaint cause I had to get a fan

The location is amazing  but there were multiple problems during the stay  First  the codes to check in did not work so we were stuck outside the room for over half an hour while someone on the phone attempted to get us inside  Secondly  we were never given our door fobs to enter the building room so we had to use different codes  up to   digits long  every time we needed to leave the room  Thirdly  the elevators broke down at one point leaving us stranded on the   th floor while they were fixed  The room was great  and the location is amazing  the rest was problem after avoidable problem

This Airbnb was in a safe  beautiful apartment building that was within walking distance of many things we did during our visit  It was clean and comfortable and made for a great home away from home  Everything was as described and we had a smooth check in and check out process  thank you for allowing us to stay at your wonderful property  we had a great time
Great place to stay  Perfect place anyone who wants to visit St Louis

We enjoyed our stay  The parking was great  comfortable bed and loved the amenities  Such a perfect location  We enjoyed our stay  Although when we first checked in it smelled like someone had just gone to the bathroom and there were some clean items missed

The location of the Airbnb is amazing  Right in the heart of Lincoln Park neighborhood  Check in was easy  all of my questions were answered within a reasonable amount of time  The Airbnb is more of a bare minimum space  if you are just looking for a place to sleep with minimal amenities in an awesome location this is the place for you
great location  exactly as described thank you place was great
Great location  clean apartment
There isn t any parking near at all place was dirty pricing is good tho Please Add Option For Paid Parking

Do not book with Zencity  They took my reservation and never sent me check in details  I waited around for   hours only to have to contact Airbnb for a refund  This occurred while sitting outside of the property
This place was pretty good so comfortable and have a beautiful view  I had an amazing stay   The place was perfect but the parking was so difficult   Everything else was amazing

Be prepared to fight with the door when you get there  it s impossible to unlock and they didn t tell us this until AFTER we d been trying to get inside for    minutes  Also they will try to scam more money from you  They were unprofessional upon check in  only informing us that the door was tricky to open AFTER we were locked out for    minutes and had called Them multiple times  They finally sent me a video on how to properly open the door  but they should have sent that to me up front    Also they tried to charge me extra money claiming we checked out too late and they were unable to host an event they had planned for that evening  However when I mentioned possibly wanting to book another night with them to extend our stay  they happily sent me a bill for      and didn t mention that they needed the space for an event that same day  Seems shady to me  Overall they could have been more professional

Great area   The place was extremely nice  clean  parking wasn t bad  We stayed on a mon wed  One suggestion is that they should rent to only     ppl  The other residents complain of simple noise  The television  group conversation  It s an old building and the walls are thin so you should expect a lil sound

Fantastic apartment in the thick of wicker park  There is a lot about    miles away with reasonable daily parking rates  keep in mind that this is a  th floor walk up in case anyone in your party has any mobility issues  And do yourself a favor and grab some Devil Dawgs from next door  Had a great time  the apartment was lovely  would rebook

This downtown apartment was beautiful and was perfect for my husband and I and my in laws  We had plenty of space and everything was very clean  The check in process was a little confusing but once we got the keys and figured out how to use the elevators  it was a breeze  Would definitely recommend
Conveniently located  Great view  clean place  Would stay again

A friend and I spent a week at this AirBNB  First the pros  The location is thirty minutes by bus from every major tourist attraction and fifteen or less by Uber Lyft  It s a great location  The space is also fantastic  there are living areas  bedrooms  and bathrooms separated by a floor so privacy for two people or two couples is fantastic  It s a recently renovated space and it looks great in photos and also in person   Now the cons that we experienced are going to echo some previous reviews on this site  This is the first place run by a big leasing company that I ve stayed at and I was disappointed  Once we got into the apartment  we discovered the place was swarming with gnats  so many that the downstairs was uninhabitable  This necessitated another call to the      number where a man named Marty intimated that he knew they were there and immediately offered    dollars off our      stay  while telling us that we would have to take care of the situation ourselves   I am happy to say that our home remedy worked  so here it is in case you need it  sugar dissolved in water with a little bit of apple cider vinegar and some dishsoap  Maintenance did show up the next day  after we contacted someone through Airbnb with a ton of pictures  and said it was the fault of the previous occupant  but the gnats still came back after he sprayed and put up traps  which we got to stare at for the remainder of our vacation  along with our bowls of stuff   The gnats never went away   Additionally  the internet was spotty and didn t work well enough for the tv to work most of the time   It did not work on the bottom floor  This is not an apartment where teleworking is easily available without a personal hotspot   This is not an apartment that s handicap accessible   I didn t need that when I originally booked the space  but I did after busting my knee  so I felt I should mention it   The washer dryer is not in the apartment  It is located in a room at the back of the building and requires you to download an app to use it  Be very careful because the minimum amount of money you can put on it is       so I lost almost      that I can t get back   In general  communication was poor  We received our check in information on time  but it was incorrect  There was no information in the apartment of expectations or other typical information that I m used to allow us to take care of the apartment in the proper fashion  We didn t get our check out information until the day after I requested it  an hour before we were scheduled to leave for the airport   Each person that we talked to was a different person with a different understanding of the apartment  the history of our stay  and our requests   Finally  my last email from Zencity requested that only positive reviews be posted on Airbnb and negative thoughts be privately directed to the company  I felt this was unfair to future renters so I decided to post a review  which is something I normally don t do  A friend Really clean and comfortable living space  I booked this apartment for my mom and aunt who were visiting for my graduation  They are seniors and we needed something quiet  nearby our apartment  secure and comfortable  This was the perfect stay for them and check in and check out was very seamless  Thanks for the beautiful apartment  it worked perfectly  Only issue was that the wifi wasnt working and there wasnt responsiveness regarding that matter when we messaged the host  We were able to connect to a xfinity hotspot so it wasnt a huge problem but heads up
Such a nice stay
Good location  Very comfortable space  A good feel to it for either a weekend or an extended stay    Coffee shop downstairs makes for a great added extra

Good location  Not very clean  One of the comforters has a blood stain on it  couch was dirty and stained  floor was filthy overall the place was dusty  I think you should reconsider who you chose to clean this place

Awesome view of the city and provides easy access to food  including a grocery store on the first floor   parks  shopping  lakefront  and public transit   We would definitely want to stay here again  We really enjoyed our stay   Only thing to consider is whether theres a way to manage the shedding rug  This may have been more of an issue with our stay because our kiddo was playing on the rug  and on the couch and was getting rug fiber and  fur balls  everywhere   Also  stools at the kitchen bar top could be helpful to avoid food stains in the main living area

I think this spot is great in terms of location  but the bed was uncomfortable almost like it was broken  Also there s a really bad smell throughout the building and in the apartment   If you can withstand the smell   location and space of the apartment are perfect
Great neighborhood  location  and cute comfortable accommodations  Great location  cute place space  and comfortable beds  Need more outlets in the family room and detailed clean
Great space

Overall it was a nice place  The view was great  free wifi  and for me parking was a breeze  It was a quiet place and the doormen were such nice people  Made check in smooth  The clean wasn t that great  When I got there there was still food and crumbs in the fridge from the previous guest  the floor needed to be swept and mopped  On the floor in the bedroom there was this weird sticky looking stuff on the floor by the closet  I didn t touch it to figure out what it was   And the window curtains were stained at the bottom  That part wasn t that big of a deal but appearance wise it could be something to think about  And the bathroom shower caddy is extremely dirty

Bed sheets on a couple rooms were not clean  other than that  things went smoothly Hi   A couple of things to note   First of all  the bed sheets were dirty  There was dirt  hairs  and they smelled like sweat  So I find appropriate to get a refund for the clean fee  since the apartment was not clean from the get go   Secondly  the code expired on the door lock  making us late for our flight  We had to call and figure out a new access code while the lyft was waiting for us at the entrance   Increased the lyft fare by       Please provide a refund for this as well   This is the first time that something like this happens to me at an airbnb   I know that sometimes these things happen  However  I find it fair to receive a refund for both the clean fee and the increased lyft fare given the inconveniences   Thank you  Juan Carlos

Location for U Chicago is great  very close  Be ready for an old apartment  it is    years old building  Lobby nice room is old  Price is good  Carpet should be cleaner  If you want to have windowcurtain installed during their stay  you should let them know before they check in  We do noted elsewherecomfortable to have people walk into install curtain during this pandemic period
Great space in a safe location  Would stay here again

Really liked the location but we had difficulties at check in  Due to travel schedules  I arrived to the airbnb late where I discovered the lockbox containing the key was empty  I attempted to get ahold of someone and had to wait    minutes for someone to pick up the phone  on hold as its an office handling the property and not a person   At that point  the instructions to get into the building were not super helpful  the wifi information was incorrect and the place was not particularly clean  The bed sheets and towels were but the floor was not  There was also a lot of damage to the doors  walls and carpet  I liked the location but check in was difficult because of the issues with the key box  it took a while to get ahold of someone to help so I was stucking standing on the street at night with all my stuff in a neighborhood I didnt know  the information provided was all incorrect  including wifi and password  plus there was a lot of damage in the apartment and it was not very clean
Great place
My friends and I had a fantastic stay here  The apartment was comfortable  We were within walking distance of many attractions  We had a great stay  Thank you

Decently located  Zencity was helpful  A cute place with a small yet equipped kitchen  I would stay here again  Mariano was super helpful  I had a few concerns with the stay  First  the shower curtain has some mildew and could be changed  Also I asked questions twice through the app and didnt get any response  Other than that  we really enjoyed our stay

This was such a great location  Walking distance to tons of bars and restaurants in Wicker park  The inside was nice  living room area was spacious  The one thing to note is that the unit is on the fourth floor so there are LOTS of stairs to go up  which mostly was a pain when bringing all our luggage up but definitely manageable  The kitchen did not have many ingredient essentials which was fine for us but more of a heads up if you plan on cooking  Thanks for a great stay

The Zencity apartment was a good little apartment and it met our needs  There were a few things about the apartment that were a bit annoying  They only gave you one towel per person  a huge section of the blinds in our room were missing so the sun was SUPER bright  the place was fairly clean but you could tell is was done quickly as tons of dust and such piled up in the corners  there was absolutely zero amenities in the kitchen to use  this may be due to COVID   and there was no seating in the living room other than a small couch  so it wasnt the best for hanging out  They also came over to fix things  not requested by us  twice during our stay  With that said  the location was great   it was right by the metro  The check in process was smooth and easy and the price was great for the location  Overall  if you just need a place to sleep thats affordable and easy access to downtown and other areas of Chicago  its a great option

My boyfriend  and I planned a last minute trip to Chicago and drove there  The location of the airbnb is amazing  It is close to all of the stores and lots of restaurants  We felt safe in the area and the apartment building had a doorman on staff all night  The airbnb has a balcony with a beautiful view and you really get to enjoy the city of Chicago  The airbnb was the perfect size for two people  maybe you could fit a third  They also had Hulu and Netflix on the Tv which was nice  There was a washer dryer as well  It felt like home and was very enjoyable  Loved the apartment complex too  they had a fitness room pool table fireplace  We will stay there again on our next trip  Only con if you drive is parking  a little confusing and was pricey  The garages are more expensive then the street parking  but we felt more comfortable parking in the garage  Loved it    Suggestion  Maybe explain the parking situation or specifically suggest a garage  Parking was difficult to understand and the garages were extremely pricey

AMAZING Spot  Value was incredible for price  Place comes fully stocked like a time share  Kitchen fully stocked with dishware  pots and pans  Bathroom fully stocked like a hotel batheoom  The two bedroom extremely comfortable space  beds  and clean  Climate control was automatic and on point  The stackable washer and dryer comes with ALL Clear detergent pods ready to wash which was very convenient  There is a little market approximately    ft  away for anything you need  The parking you just need to be mindful about but we easily found parking nightly in the residential area at the corner street   ft away  I would definitely use this Airbnb again  Zenity did an amazing job of keeping the house  move in ready   There were minor details that if addressed would make the place   stars  The floors especially in the entrance  hallway  and living room area were not very clean  They were swept  Although i decided to walk bear foot one evening and my feet ended up black and sticky  The carpet were the coffee table is same problem for same reason that is a high traffic area and its vaccuumed but not very clean  I decided to sit on the carpet instead of floor to stretch and the gunk was visible  Same goes for the couch and chair  So if that high traffic area the couch  chair  and carpert was deep clean it would be a great improvement  The bed in the last bedroom is tremendously squeaky and any little movement made could be heard throughout the home  Also we did not know were to put our trash when we emptied the trashcans  So we just ended up dumping it in the back blue dumpster  A heads up for guest like a little note on the cute chalkboard in the kitchen  Lastly my teenage son was with us and would have appreciated an extra TV in bedroom   We kind of took over the TV and he retreated to his bedroom on the phone and tablet but another TV would have been nice  Oh and I almost forgot the bathtub was extremely slippery when wet  we kept a towel in the bathtub at all times so we wouldnt sleep  So one of the thise tub mats would work well

You will love the location of this unit if you are looking to access downtown and the river market   Lots to do and explore and you are right in front of a stop for the free city trolley   Unit was very clean  but you will be on your own to figure out what is available for the gym  trash disposal  etc   When you do figure it out  its great   The gym is not heavily used  and the open workspaces are all over the place for you    If you want peace and quiet  this is not the place for you   Most nights the neighbors were very noisy   Zencity is quick to respond  but their answers are not always complete   I spent three weeks on site  so I ended up figuring everything out  but would have liked some additional information   Look at other units if you need workspace for computer  this unit only had a chair the kitchen table and the configuration is a bit odd   Kitchen has the basics  but no cooking utensils  well  one    so bring some with you if you plan on cooking   Bedroom and closets are spacious  laundry is  full size and great  I feel like even though Zencity made efforts at communication  they did not provide a map to the property amenities and left you on your own to figure things out   Also  the photos were taken at deceptive angles implying more space than the unit actually had   Property was entered without notice or permission for exterminators   Property had inadequate kitchen supplies   virtually no kitchen tools   only a plastic spoon to cook with   The location made up for the lack of information  but this could have been solved with some info left in the unit   On the good side   great clean supplies   very convenient and appreciated

An excellent location for shops  restaurants and the University of Chicago in a  safe neighborhood and building  The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen was adequately furnished  There were nice fluffy white towels and the bathroom had plenty of amenities and supplies  We would definitely return to this delightful apartment  I gave you an excellent review  on the assumption that the air conditioning will be fixed before the next guests arrive  I would suggest a bit more wall decor  The space is very bland with just a couple small pictures  rather randomly placed  A bottle of olive oil would be a great addition  as with a small set of salt and pepper  I had thought you would be willing to give a     discount because of the lack of air conditioning on those very hot Chicago days  You might wish to consider a couple small fans since the windows don t open very much and air circulation is minimal  I hope you were able to locate the source of the leak in the kitchen before too much more damage was done  FYI  when we reported FYI  when we reported the leak downstairs  the response was  I will send an email   That is  a lack of recognition that it was a serious problem

We found the unit very comfortable and well located  Area was quite safe and we enjoyed walking in downtown KC  There are enough restaurants and transportation close by so you can manage without a car   The unit s amenities   kitchen supply is lacking   but hopefully will be improved   It is roomy  beds are comfortable and it was a bonus to have a washer and dryer to use  Staff was reachable by phone and helpful when needed   All in all  a good value and I would definitely stay in the future  We thought the unit was great  Checkin is a bit tricky for two retired folks but we managed   Feel that in a new unit like this  you need to provide a few more kitchen amenities   We had one teaspoon and one tablespoon    The addition of a real coffee maker and a toaster would be a big improvement    Also the plugs behind the sink did not work and it was very slow to get hot water in the kitchen sink   Staff were easy to reach and very helpful so would definitely stay again if available

This apartment and experience was both the best and the worst of AirBnB   First  the good news  The apartment was great for what we wanted to do  namely  explore Chicago with our two teenage daughters     and      The location was fantastic  The apartment was really spacious  it was actually bigger than in looked in the pictures   with a large central room  two good sized bedrooms  and a ton of closet space  The small study was a great addition when people had to work online  and having the extra half bath was convenient  The space was light filled  with big windows  and the A C worked well    we were very comfortable even in a hot Chicago summer   The place was remarkably quiet  given that it was on a busy intersection  Unlike other Air BnBs weve had in the past  there were no surprise restaurant smells  If this were a private home the bathroom would need to be completely redone and updated  but it was functional for an AirBnB  Overall  the building and the apartment have a sort of decayed elegance that was charming  real parquet floors    The place was clean  with fresh new towels and linens  The neighborhood is terrific  and the girls could come and go on their own  It was super easy to take the bus downtown  It was much better staying here than the   of us cramming in a double hotel room  and much cheaper than the   of us staying in   hotel rooms    The bad news  We had a disastrous check in experience  We had received instructions on how to retrieve the keys to the building and the apartment from a lockbox outside the building  Check in time was       We actually arrived at the address at       and respectfully waited in the car  parked in a loading zone  until      in case there were cleaners in the apartment  At that point I jumped out and put the code into the lockbox    which turned out to be empty   The next day  when we finally got into the apartment  the keys were hanging on the peg with the  return keys here  sign    we presume the clean crew simply forgot to return the keys to the lockbox   From my fading iPhone   I sent several messages to Zencity through AirBnB  and my husband and I both called the Zencity contact number    he got through to someone  but as soon as he said that there was no key in the box the call was dropped  or they hung up  he thinks   I was on hold for    minutes before giving up  So there we were  sitting in the car for about two hours in a loading zone with a car full of stuff and teenagers in the blazing sun  thank you  nearby Target bathrooms  with no Plan B  I went on Booking com and managed to find us a hotel room  We finally heard from a Zencity rep around       and he gave us the codes for the other lockboxes  the  backup  box and cleaners   But by that point we were already in the hotel  Zencity did agree to refund us for the amount of our hotel bill for that first night  but it was terribly inconvenient and stressful  My sense was that Zencity is an organization based in California  and that they didnt have anyone actually on the ground in Chicago  If that is the business model  they need to have a hotline of sorts where people can immediately speak to someone if there is a problem  They advertise a one hour response time  but that was not our experience  Good apartment  but there need to be more layers of back up plans when the system of leaving the key in the lockbox fails    as it did for us  We couldnt get into the apartment  and it was about   hours until we finally got in touch with a Zencity representative who could help us by providing the codes for the other lockboxes  by which point we had already checked into a hotel    FYI  the ceiling fan in the living room closest to the kitchen needs to be fixed  and it is time to mop the floors

Quick note  this was our first time using Airbnb  Some of the negative things we experienced may be normal by Airbnb standards  but to us they seemed a little odd  especially booking from a company that has many Airbnb locations  We expected things to be tighter    The apartment was nice  quaint  and comfortable  and its location was very convenient  It was wonderful to be located directly across from a park  Having kids ourselves  it was a delight to see families enjoying themselves each day  It was wonderful to have food  liquor  coffee and the L station all within a   minutes walk  Each morning I took a walk to a local coffee shop to pickup breakfast and coffee  You could see folks from the community out and about  families going for walks  dog walkers  exercisers and more  all with a smile on their faces ready to start the day  It was also nice being able to walk to the liquor store each night for a bottle of wine  It felt safe doing so  even in the later hours  This all  location wise   was quite fun and convenient for us  The apartment is also in a quite location making it easier to relax  not needing to hear the hustle and bustle of the city   Before our arrival we were provided with rather detailed instructions of how to acquire the key to get into the building  how to get into the apartment and how to access the WiFi  Being a very detailed person myself I really liked this    However  there were a few things we had issues with   Once inside the building and at the apartment door  it took us about    minutes to get in  The instructions said to type in the access code then press the  lock button   We did this over and over until we decided to press the pound   button  which then unlocked the door   We tried to log on to the Wi Fi   but the network name was not what was sent to us in the instructions or what was written on the black board in the main room  both of those were the same   After sifting through all of the networks that our computers were picking up  we noticed one that looked like an abbreviated version of what we were told  Once we selected that  we entered the password that was given and that did work   Upon waking up after the first night my wife went to take a soak in the tub  Unfortunately  she was unable to since there was no stopper for the drain  I messaged Zencity via the Airbnb app regarding this  asking is there was one in the apartment somewhere  We never received a response  We searched the entire apartment and were unable to located a stopper  This was quite disappointing since the point of our trip was to relax and one of the main points that lead us to select this particular apartment was the clawfoot tub  featured in the photos    At the time of writing this review  we still have not received any response regarding this    While it didnt affect us  we thought it may be useful for folks to know that the apartment is an  able bodied only  stay  Wheelchairs would be impossible because of the multiple floors of steep steps and narrow hallways and no elevator  Quick note  this was our first time using Airbnb   The apartment was nice  quaint  and comfortable  However  there were a few things we had issues with  The first was with getting into the apartment   Once inside the building and at the apartment door  it took us about    minutes to get in  The instructions said to type in the access code then press the  lock button   We did this over and over until we decided to press the pound   button  which then unlocked the door   After getting unpacked and comfortable  we went to log into the Wi Fi  The network name was not what was sent to us in the instructions nor what was written on the black board in the main room  both of those were the same   After sifting through all of the networks that our computers were picking up  we noticed one that looked like an abbreviated version of what we were told  Once we selected that  we entered the password that was given to us and that did work   Upon waking up after the first night my wife went to take a soak in the tub  Unfortunately  she was unable to since there was no stopper for the drain  I messaged yall via the Airbnb app  at      AM             regarding this  asking is there was one in the apartment somewhere  We never received a response and still have not  We searched the entire apartment and were unable to the photos  for my wife to relax in  As of this writing    PM             we still have not received any response from the message I sent   We did like the location of the apartment  It was wonderful Great studio apartment in the perfect location  This place is for travelers looking for an authentic city dweller stay  Train and bus stop right outside the door  great eats in walking free delivery cheap Lyft distance    min walk to Boystown and   min walk to Wrigleyville    This place is not for light sleepers or those who want peace and quiet  Staying here means being in the midst of active city life  There were some things I would like to see improved with clean and amenities  but the company was responsive    PROS  big deep tub and large shower head  kitchenware  cute decor  nice new high tech building  perfect location for nightlife and good eats I left a three star rating for cleanliness because the throw cover on the bed was noticeably discolored and smelled odd  The rug was poorly vacuumed  with lots of noticeable debris lint litter  I vacuumed myself when I arrived because I wanted to wear no shoes  There was also no garbage can in the kitchen  so I put a trash bag in the bin that was in the utility closet  Additionally  some of the cabinet shelves with wine glasses and coffee ground grinder had a thick layer of dust  which made me concerned that all surfaces arent being sanitized between visits  Last  the outside patio furniture was not in good shape either    The decor and TV setup was great  LOVED the location and easy check in  I was really disappointed not to have a key fob  It made accessing the building from the other entrances impossible  and standing at the call box waiting for the gate to unlock made me nervous after getting off the train  As a native Chicagoan  Im always looking to avoid putting myself at risk  When I was told there was another fob in the lockboxes  I dont think anyone realized that there were almost    boxes there  So improving the quality control before guests arrived is my main suggestion  Id stay with Zencity again if these things were improved

I would not stay here again   Lots of clean needs to be done to pass any hygiene standards      The code we were given to get in was the wrong one  the building was extremely hot  the place was filthy per our previous conversations and pics sent   The automation of info wasnt as appreciated as a personal fast communication we received from other AirBnB hosts

The intercom at the main door didn t work upon check in   we were lucky enough to be let in by other tenants where everything else went smooth  Parking is a bit difficult and we ended up using the parking garage   blocks away  The keypad to the room is digital   confused us at first b c the surrounding rooms have numbers on the knob  You simply press the touch screen   the numbers appear  Upon checkout they accused us of dismantling a doorknob to one of the doors  which we did not do  Overall went okay   would stay here again  The intercom at the main door didn t work as described upon check in   we were lucky enough to be let in where everything else went smooth  The keypad to the room is digital   confused us at first b c the surrounding rooms have numbers on the knob  You simply press the touch screen   the numbers appear  We did not dismantle a doorknob  Overall our visit was great and would recommend to others

NOT a Zen experience  ZenCity does not comply with the Chicago Heat Ordinance which require landlords to keep daytime temps a minimum of    degrees  As a result when I arrived the pipes were frozen   it was in the single digits during my trip  No water in the apartment until the middle of the next day   And I was unable to stay warm in the apartment  I was denied my request to control the temperature  they control the Nest thermostat  And my requests to speak with a manager went unfulfilled   I do not recommend staying here  Need to align your policies with the City of Chicago Heating Ordinance  Your lack of compliance with the law made my trip miserable

Overall the apartment was decent and its in a pretty nice spot  I travelled from Indiana and had asked several times about how the parking worked and never really got a clear answer but was offered a  pm early check in which I accepted  I asked all of my questions between  a  p and all of the responses came overnight so I essentially got the response the next day  not a big deal until I had problems getting into the apartment    First off  the parking garage isnt available until you check in so you have to park on the street temporarily  check in  then move your car into the garage  The front desk staff was less than helpful and literally handed me the keycard and said  Im sure you can figure it out   not really Zencitys fault but they could provide more info in their check in instructions   From there I figured out that the ONE assigned parking spot is on the  th level which connects to the  th floor of the apartment building  The one keycard is needed to access almost everything   including garage entrance and exit  building entrance  elevator buttons  except floor    and so on  Not a huge deal but the one card created a few logistics issues  Check out is also a bit of a hassle because you are asked to leave the keycard in the room  but you need it to get out of the garage   so you have to get your car out of the garage before you go back upstairs to leave the keycard   Check in was a bit of a nightmare  as I mentioned earlier Zencity offered early  pm early check in which I accepted  I was able to get the keycard  park  and get up to the apartment  with a ton of my mothers luggage I might add  only to find that the   digit code I was given to unlock the electronic deadbolt didnt work  I reached out to Zencity for help but didnt get a response  We decided to put all of our luggage back in the car and continue on with our day  Later when we came back  well after the normal  p check in  the code magically worked   The posting says the apartment hosts    and with an air mattress this could easily be    I had indicated there would be   in my group yet there where only   towels  There was also only one dish towel in the kitchen  There were no hot pads or oven mitts for the oven  and there was only one cooking sheet  There was no standard coffee pot  just a french press  again  not a huge deal for me but it may be for someone   The  smart  thermostat constantly changed to some setting other than what it was set at  There was mold in one of the showers  the fridge is scratched and dented  one of the tables is damaged  the wall mounted toilet paper and towel holders where all falling off  the trash can was broke  the doors squeak and one of the chairs is so bent it doesnt sit level  For those that care  the apartment building has a rule stating only two persons per apartment in the pool   This may seem like a lot of complaining but I spent the most Ive ever spent on this particular Airbnb and I feel like there were a lot of little issues that all added up  Its obvious no one lives here permanently and so many of the little things have gone unnoticed  Need to improve communication  All responses to my requests happened overnight  When I had an issue checking in no one responded  Also provide more info about parking   you have to park on the street for a bit before getting the pass to the garage  Parking spot     is on the  th level which connects to the  th floor of the apartment building  If you offer someone early check in the keycode needs to work at that time

We picked this unit thinking it would be nice and in a nice area  the area was not bad  However  the unit it s self was run down  You could tell they tried to give  luxury  upgrades to the unit  We arrived on       the unit was not clean pass first glance looking  In fact the last time the unit had been clean was       and the property manager forgot to wipe it fully off the wifi board when he did the walk through  The sad part is he knew the unit wasn t clean and tried to comment that he was checking behind the cleaners  Not only was the unit not clean there was bugs flying around in the bathroom and on the ceiling in the bathroom  the walls in the unit are thin so the neighbors walking and continuously barking dog are heard all night long  Literally the dog was barking from the time we arrived till the time we left  The windows also need to be resealed as they let in quite the dead as one on us now has a cold  We would turn the heat on and the rest of the unit would be warm but the bedroom freezing  To top that off on our second day we came back to the unit only to be staring at an eviction notice from the building owner stating they were evicting zencity and all occupants in the zencity unit from the building  This was the Worst Airbnb experience the host was not communicative at all and we were very uncomfortable leaving our things there upon receiving the eviction notice  We dealt with an eviction notice and an unclean unit  The floors were gross  there were bugs flying around in and on the ceiling of the shower and the window seals let in a bunch of cold air making one of us get a cold  The walls are super thin in the unit and we constantly heard noice from those above us  The neighbors dog barks a majority of the day

Great place to stay in Hyde Park  The location was wonderful for access to the lake as well as walking distance to the center of Hyde Park  The apartment was clean  the building staff were very welcoming and kind  and the gym was a good place to get a good workout in on a rainy day  We stayed for a week and were very comfortable and happy here  We had a great stay and will highly recommend this place   We do have two suggestions that might be useful to you      Have oil  salt  pepper for basic cooking      Add a couple more pieces of furniture that would warm up the space as well as make it more comfortable  We would suggest a desk or small table to the living room and a slim table or dresser in the bedroom to add a couple more surfaces to place things  As well as a second couch or comfier chair

Beautiful apartment  exactly as shown in pictures  Very sensitive to any noise  The noise monitoring system is very sensitive  if anything falls it alerts that too much noise is being made  Would advise altering this for future stays

We were disappointed that the apartment was not as clean as we had expected  The front bedroom bed sheets had not been changed  There was no top sheet  creases that looked like someone had just slept on them and there was hair on the pillow case  I was going to put fresh sheets on the bed  but the ones I found in the little freestanding bedroom cabinet were in a ball on the shelf and also had hair on them  The bathroom door was filthy  and there was toothpaste on the wall   The entry to the building was filthy as well  I wouldnt rent this airbnb again  They dont post photos of the tiny bathroom  most likely because they couldnt get a decent angle for the camera lense due to the size  It wasnt as clean as I would have liked  not terrible  but definitely not as clean as a bathroom should be  The grout is filthy  the door had splash marks of some kind down it  there was toothpaste on the wall  and the paint around mirror that acts as a door of the  medicine cabinet   where the extra shampoo is kept  is completely worn off where you open it  It wouldnt take much to touch up the paint every once in awhile to make it more presentable  Its obvious the owners have no pride in the place  It was easy to get the key out of the lock box that is attached to the door of the building  That being said  the tiny entry to the building was not only filthy  it was full of old mailers and boxes  Its actually a hazard  If I could post the pictures of the tiny entry and the narrow  dirty staircase that runs at an angle  I would  The bedroom that looks over Belmont was not clean before we arrived  There was no top sheet and there was hair in the bed and on one of the pillow cases  There were creases on the fitted sheet which looked like a sheet after someone has slept on them   I looked under the fitted sheet at the mattress pad and it had disgusting stains  I found extra sheets in the little freestanding closet  but they were dirty as well  It truly was disgusting  Needless to say we didnt use that bed  When I complained to Zencity regarding the dirty sheets and mouse poop in the kitchen cabinet  they kindly offered a  touch up   However  I truly didnt want one of their cleaners back in the unit when we were not there  and since we were not going to use the dirty bedroom  or any of the kitchen amenities  we decided it best to turn down their offer of sending someone in to clean   They did offer a refund of our clean fee  which we accepted   That was very generous of them  Location is good  and street parking was easy and plentiful  but noisy at night due to it being directly on Belmont

My experience with Zencity is exactly why I avoid staying with corporate AirBnBs  While the location of the apartment and customer service were both good  there were many things about the place that were an issue  especially cleanliness  When we arrived  we noticed that the floors underneath the couch or bed hadn t been clean  there were some old food wrappers found even   there were leftover pizza crumbs on the kitchen counter and work desk  some cobwebs on the ceiling and when we swept up before leaving  we even found ants  Additionally  there was a lot of water damage to the ceiling in most of the rooms and the bathroom even had some mold growing above the bathtub  The bedroom door doesn t close completely and will lock you out if you try to do so  As far as the kitchen amenities  be sure to bring your own water if you book here because they do not provide a water filter and there is only hot water from the sink  This all reflects the fact that THIS IS NOT AN ACTUAL APARTMENT  This is a corporate owned space that is just trying to make as much money as possible with the least amount of effort  The day before we checked out  we received an email offering to extend the stay by a night for      We considered this because of the location and requested the extension  only to receive an email saying they would allow this extension for       When I declined and sent them a want to overpay for place where you have to live with ants  mold and re wash all of the dishes because they are coated with dirt  aka the dishwasher does not work properly   All in all  the effort is The location is convenient  right next to the Belmont L station   Plenty of restaurants and shopping in the neighborhood   Lake Michigan is just a short walk   The space is small  a studio  and rather stark   There was no place to sit other than the table and chairs   The kitchen was minimally equipped   Train noise is not an issue since the windows are well insulated   We had a problem with the condo door keypad for entry   It took a call to Zencity and downloading an iPhone app to gain entry  The entry process was a bit complicated with all the codes   There are two gates and one door to get though before entering the building   The condo front door key pad didnt work   I had to call Zencity   You provided me with a phone app to open the door  which was a bit complicated and time consuming

Great spot with a great view    th floor with a dining table that is surrounded by windows  In and out is easy  Parking isnt included  but with Spot Hero or Parking com we were able to snag some good deals for as low as     a night  Theres even a    minute unloading space in front of the building  which made it more convenient that I anticipated  Finishes are very nice  The kitchen is tight  but very functional  Perfect for two couples on a long weekend  The balcony is pretty stellar as well  Would stay again  The listing states that there is air conditioning  but there was clearly no air conditioning  Im guessing the building as a whole hasnt turned over yet to AC  but it would have been nice to know prior to booking  or at least check in  We all slept poorly    Otherwise  the apartment was beautiful  Incredible view and great decor  Details said air conditioning  however it was clearly not turned on in the building  None of us slept well because it was hot and stuffy in the evenings and loud with the windows open

Though the location of this unit is perfect and had potential to be a wonderful stay the unit was not clean and we needed to move to a hotel   Immediately upon entering the unit  we were hit by a strong cigarette smell  After walking around in     degree weather waiting for check  in we needed to shower  One of us hopped in the shower and we soon found out they there were no towels in the unit  Not even a hand towel  The  shower was filthy and was covered in the last guest s purple shampoo  The purple shampoo was in the tub and the shower curtain  The shower curtain was covered in mold and extremely dirty   We needed to dry our selves off with back up sheets which were in a closet that unfortunately also had stains    Gross   In between the sink vanity and the cabinet there is black mold which is a health hazard   The bedsheets had hair on them and appeared as though they had not been washed  The carpet was covered in crumbs  and the floors were covered with dust and debris in some sections    The couch pillows were stained   The kicker is that there was a  last clean  sticker by the wifi code  The date on it was over   weeks before our stay   Though the bed was made and the trash had been taken out it was very clear that the unit had not been thoroughly clean in between guests  Which is shocking as it is listed as  enhanced clean    We immediately tried to get in touch with the host and they did not get back to us for hours  until air bnb cancelled our booking   and processed a refund   When that happened  they immediately contacted us   What was extremely frustrating was that all of the other comparable units in the area had been booked and we were unable to relocate with another unit in the central west end with a kitchen or access to a washer dryer  We wound up getting the very last room at a hotel in the area  Needless to say  we reshowered    On a positive note  the doorman was fantastic  Our plane landed at    and they watched our bags for us until check in  The building staff were extremely lovely as well    Air Bnb also support was easy to work with and made it clear from the beginning that we were protected in this situation   I would avoid booking with this company

The space looked exactly like the pictures  It was clean and quiet and i enjoyed my stay here overall  The host provides you with towels  pots and pans  and clean supplies  The TV is also logged in to almost every streaming provider so that was nice  The only thing that was a bit annoying is that Free Parking is listed under amenities but there really isn t anywhere to park your car  We had to park far away and walk to the apartments because there is VERY limited street parking  Also  the listing gives you the option to look on the SpotHero for paid parking but just a heads up if you park in any garage you cannot leave and come back in even if you paid for multiple days  Also there is a washer and dryer but its in the basement and you need quarters to use it  Thanks i loved the space  The only thing I would say is that you should let guests know that there isnt really any parking near the apartments and they will either have to pay for a garage or park far away and walk to the apartment which can be annoying with a lot of bags  no parking

BEWARE  READ AND BELIEVE THE NEGATIVE REVIEWS      I have rented many Airbnb s  This is by far the worst experience I have had  I wished I believed the negative reviews and steered clear   to note for everyone  the host ZenCity is a large property management company that specializes in marketing and AirBnB and drives their costs down by offering terrible management services   here are the Key issues I ran into  They are all common themes amongst reviews     the digital locks malfunction OFTEN  we were locked out of the property for an entire evening  We called the host  a call center in the Philippines is who answers  and we were on the phone with them for   hours  in the rain  with my   and    year old daughters  to argue with them about the problem and they never sent anyone to help us  We gave up and got a hotel for the night   We made videos and provided to the host on how their new wifi   digital only locks were not accepting input     service is terrible  if you have an emergency  liked a family of   with young kids being locked out for the entire night due to a wifi lock not working   there is no actual owner   people available  ZenCity  the host  is a large property manager and you only talk to call center representatives in the Philippines   When we eventually had to get a hotel for the night  the host even argued   declined to reimburse us for the hotel  Luckily Airbnb is handling this for us      the property is filthy  Crumbs on counter tops  sticky floors and hand railings  hair on rugs  stains on towels etc  even trash left on the rooftop patio    the property is run down  The clothes dryer doesn t work  the toilets run  the outdoor furniture is moldy  literally     the property stinks  like cigarette smoke and dust   All in all  it is house is a run down dump with worn out trendy furniture that is run by a large company who don t really care about the property  their service  or you   It s better suited as a party house for a beer pong match and not a place any family  especially with younger children should consider   And to the host  shame on you  Your business model puts the end consumer dead last  We were locked out ALL NIGHT because of malfunctioning digital locks and you had no contingency plan for emergencies  What if one of my children had medication  What if we had an infant and needed formula  diapers etc   It disgusts me how little you think about the peoples lives who rent your homes  This is a terrible business model offering fully outsourced services with no real ownership  and one of the reasons AirBnb has a bad name amongst homeowners  You should be thrown off this platform  As discussed  the property was very dirty  the clothes dryer did not work  and the lock malfunctioned and there was no physical key available   you were unable to have anyone help us while locked out

This was a quick last minute get away for me  I envisioned a quiet place to read by the pool   and for PART of the time it was  Note  this apartment is a building of mostly college aged and young adult renters  Its a neat use of space and there are lots of public areas  including a great courtyard pool layout  When I arrived Sunday afternoon however  it was an all out pool party    or more accurately    different pool parties each attended by     people  It was a rocking place and would be fun if thats your scene  Not quite what I was looking for    On Monday morning however  when I went down to the pool at  am it was empty with the exception of the buildings clean crew and until about  pm was  mostly then quiet poolside retreat Id hope for   Some notes     theres only one elevator for the whole building and theres no freight elevator  Because I happened to be there on a  move in  type weekend there were lots of long waits for the elevator     this is a very secure building and the fob youll find at checkin is required even to leave the pool area and go back into the building  Theres only one FOB    keep it with you and know that this means if more than one person is staying youll need to figure out whos holding it and coordinate schedules because you are practically trapped without it    Ive never been in an AirBnB that doesnt have plates  silverware  etc    kitchen appliances are there and cabinetry is beautiful  but almost entirely empty  Eating in the apartment will require that you bring quite a bit in with you   even the basics   Having access to a washer dryer is fantastic  shower is great   but again  no extras  no hair dryer  etc   Some AirBnB go all out on quality linens  high thread count sheets  etc     this is not one of those places plates and silverware would be a nice addition  also perhaps a warning about the Sunday night and weekend pool crowd

 I have photos   Crumbs and debris in empty cabinet PRE Stay it was fine   By e mail messaging  sometimes host did not respond for several hours AND was unhelpful Excellent compared to the COST of a We were headed to Chicago to visit colleges with my daughter  The location was perfect  The place looked too good to be true   and it was  The bathroom shower was clogged so we stood in dirty shower water  I notified them right away and there was no response until late the next day  We went out and bought Liquid Plumber and prayed it would work  It sort of did  but still wasnt draining properly  There was a yippy dog that barked most of the daytime that we were there  Luckily  it stopped at night  Then while we were trying to sleep  water pipes were ticking all night long followed by swooshes of water  We were supposed to be there for   nights  but couldnt stand it  The lack of sleep was getting to us all  We ended up leaving a day early and spending the night at a hotel  Unfortunately  this place only had   review when we booked  so I trusted that itd be a great place  Do yourself a favor and book somewhere else    Unless you plan on getting wasted and passing out at this place so you dont mind any of the noises  On the upside  the appliances and kitchen were nice and clean  and the place had a cute deck out back to hang out  The location is awesome  but parking was hard  We ended up doing SpotHero which worked out better  If you stay in this area or downtown  dont bring a car  The public transportation is awesome  You can take the L almost anywhere  still waiting for reimbursement for inconvenience and the liquid plumber we bought  Really disappointed in the delay and lack of response from your company  overall  the place was clean  but the bathroom shower was not  It was clogged and left us standing in a pool of dirty water when we showered  I emailed and called about the clogged shower and there was no response until the next day  It was so gross that we had to go out and buy Liquid Plumber and pray that it worked  The clogged shower  a barking dog all day  creaking floors from the person above us  and loud pipe noises all night long  Wasnt worth it  We even left a day early because we couldnt take it

The property was in a great central location  however the parking was horrible  Checking in was a nightmare  I had to reach out to receive check in information as it was not provide it before hand  Then after    hours on the road get to the property and the code does not work  After calling customer service I was on hold for    minutes just to be told they would call me back in    After    minutes I called them back just to be told to download an app to enter the property  The app did not work as the last person was still connected to it and no way to disconnect them  So for another    to    minutes we were given code after code to try entry none of which worked  The final code which was    digits long finally worked  Once inside all of the blinds were broken and the shower did not work properly  I had to call customer service several times during my stay  the only rep that tried to resolve any issues was Mariano  I hope I spelled that right  This property is listed as an apartment but it really feels like a college dorm  I would not recommend if you are looking for an apartment
